Company description: Na początku Polska Akademia Protokołu i Etykiety była projektem szkoleniowym, a główną ideą jaka nam wtedy przyświecała, było przekazywanie wiedzy z zakresu savoir-vivre’u oraz protokołu dyplomatycznego w sposób daleki od sztampy i podręcznikowej dyscypliny. Nieoczekiwanie, na przestrzeni kilku lat, projekt szkoleniowy rozwinął się w kilku innych kierunkach. Nie tylko szkolimy, również doradzamy, a także realizujemy nietypowe zlecenia związane z wydarzeniami specjalnymi i kampaniami marketingowymi, których wspólnym mianownikiem jest savoir-vivre & protokół dyplomatyczny. Podpowiadamy jak w narracji produktu lub usługi wykorzystać elementy savoir-vivre’u i protokołu dyplomatycznego. Badamy również poziom obsługi przez personel różnych branż, infolinii, BOK, concierge.  Wieloletnie doświadczenie z protokołem dyplomatycznym pozwoli nam razem z Państwem przygotować szkolenia i wydarzenia o charakterze międzynarodowym na najwyższym, światowym poziomie. Konsultujemy tematy, które mają bezpośredni związek z dobrymi manierami, etykietą, savoir–vivre’em oraz protokołem dyplomatycznym i różnicami kulturowymi. Pomagamy w wyborze firmowego dress code. Wiedzę na temat zmieniających się zwyczajów, zachowań, oczekiwań, trendów budujemy na naszym doświadczeniu i obserwacjach, ale również dzięki badaniom opinii publicznej, które realizujemy z profesjonalnymi instytutami badawczymi. Do każdego przedsięwzięcia zapraszamy naszych dobrych znajomych ze świata dyplomacji, biznesu, sztuki i komunikacji marketingowej. Dzięki temu tworzymy kreatywne zespoły składające się z ekspertów o wysokim poziomie kompetencji.

Name: Studio Rosochate
Technologies: Clipboard.js, Google Fonts API, Contact Form 7, WordPress, RSS, Shopify, Facebook Pixel, Smartlook, Open Graph, Facebook, Apache HTTP Server, MySQL, jQuery Migrate, jQuery, reCAPTCHA, Apache, Yoast SEO, Google Analytics
Company description: Studio Rosochate to multidyscyplinarna pracownia graficzna, drukarnia i wydawnictwo. Od kilku lat łączymy grafiką warsztatową i projektowanie. Inspiruje nas rzemiosło i sztuka.  Drukarnia Wydawnictwo Rosochate wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom druku artystycznego. Łączymy druk typograficzny z drukiem cyfrowym, wzbogaconym o techniki warsztatowe, takie jak akwaforta, akwatinta linoryt czy serigrafia. Spod pras drukarskich Studia wychodzą książki artystyczne, a dzięki zacięciu introligatorskiemu powstają albumy, unikatowe notatniki oraz pamiątkowe księgi. Pracownia Pracownia artystyczna Studia Rosochate to najwspanialsza karta naszej historii. Tutaj powstaje wszystko, czym chcemy się dzielić. By przybliżyć fascynujący świat grafiki i druku, zapraszamy na cykliczne warsztaty i spontaniczne spotkania. Drzwi pracowni są otwarte zarówno dla profesjonalistów - grafików z pasją, jak i dla osób rozpoczynających dopiero przygodę ze sztuką. Warsztaty i pokazy W obszarze naszych zainteresowań znajdują się różnorodne odmiany druku. Sięgamy do samych korzeni sztuki drukarskiej, oferując pokazy dawnych metod powielania słowa i obrazu dzięki rekonstrukcji prasy Gutenberga. Opisujemy i pokazujemy także procesy druku renesansowych mistrzów oraz pracujemy ze składem zecerskim przy druku typograficznym. Projektowanie Graficzne Chociaż jesteśmy pracownią rzemiosł artystycznych, nie stronimy od projektowania komputerowego i nowoczesnej poligrafii. Oferujemy usługi projektowania, wydawnictw oraz stron internetowych, pośredniczymy między podwykonawcami oferując usługę poligraficznego concierge oraz konsultacje artystyczne projektów.

Company description: Más Social somos una empresa de limpieza y mantenimiento integral, fundada en 2010. Su creador y gerente Miguel A. del Pino fundó en 2006 Limpiezas Framilimza S.L como empresa ordinaria de servicios. Sería cuatro años después cuando funda MAS Social Servicios Globales de Limpieza S.L.  Más social es una empresa familiar, donde sus máximos responsables cuentan con una experiencia en empresas de limpieza de más de 20 años. Operamos en toda la provincia de Málaga. Con un considerable crecimiento desde su fundación, hoy en día contamos con más de 50 trabajadores. En 2010 Mas Social fue acreditado como Centro Especial de Empleo, comenzando la lucha por el cambio de concepción hacia las personas con discapacidad, fomentando la idea de que son tan capaces, como cualquier persona, de desempeñar un empleo, ofreciéndoles un determinado trabajo que puedan desarrollar.  A lo largo de nuestros años de experiencia hemos ido creciendo en los servicios que ofrecemos, incorporando nuevas actividades y evolucionando poco a poco como empresa multiservicio. SERVICIOS -	Limpieza y suministro de productos -	Limpieza de cristales, paredes y techos -	Limpieza de Eventos -	Fregados industriales -	Mantenimiento Integral (limpieza, reposición de fungibles, pintado, jardines…) -	Mantenimiento de piscinas -	Jardinería -	Conserjería-Mantenedor -	Control de accesos 24 horas -	Abrillantado de suelos

Company description: METROPOLIS es un grupo de empresas líder en los sectores de seguridad, facility services, business process outsourcing y logística. Dentro de estas áreas, nuestros principales servicios son: •	Seguridad: vigilancia y protección de todo tipo de dependencias, así como instalación y mantenimiento de sistemas de seguridad. •	Facility services: limpieza, conserjería, atención al público, atención telefónica, mantenimiento, jardinería, etc. •	Business Process Outsourcing: externalización de procesos de negocio con exigencia de perfiles de media y alta cualificación profesional. •	Logística y procesos industriales: recepción y validación del producto, preparación y expedición de pedidos, logística inversa, manipulados, packaging, etc. METROPOLIS dispone de su propio Centro Especial de Empleo, a través del cual fomenta la integración sociolaboral de personas con discapacidad, permitiendo a nuestros clientes la sinergia de tres factores: •	Externalización de un servicio con resultado de óptima calidad. •	Cumplimiento de la legislación en materia de integración laboral de personas con discapacidad. •	Potenciación de su Responsabilidad Social. Actualmente METROPOLIS cuenta con más de 800 profesionales dedicados a la prestación de servicios integrados a nuestros clientes, atendiendo las necesidades específicas de cada uno de ellos. Prueba de ello es nuestra amplia cartera de clientes, tanto del sector privado como del público. METROPOLIS aporta como valores fundamentales su trabajo en equipo, la cultura del esfuerzo, la inversión en formación para potenciar la profesionalidad de sus trabajadores y la promoción de los mismos, reforzando la confianza de nuestros clientes.  METROPOLIS, con sus diferentes divisiones, ofrece a sus clientes las sinergias propias de la integración de servicios con un interlocutor único y una apuesta estratégica por la innovación, así como una gestión orientada al cliente.

Company description: In the beginning, there were 3 friends, who were disappointed by the level of services in the Czech Republic (some of us were angry at the restaurant, in the post office, in the negotiations with the supplier or in the kindergarten). Now they have the time and the desire to realize their pampered thought (a friend who relieves them from worries) and so ... an idea for MyTimi was born (my time :)) Our goal is to provide top-level personal assistance / concierge services. We will do whatever the customer wants (if it is legal). For every task we try to get the so-called "extra mile," a feeling of extraordinary service. We try to grab even the simplest assignment and do everything we see our client "in the eyes". We always try to get to our client maximum of free time. In fulfilling the tasks we are obsessed with the speed and quality of customer service, there is nothing but the best for us.

Name: Program Health Plus
Technologies: LinkedIn Insights, Google Font API, Google Analytics, jsDelivr, Modernizr, Google Fonts API, PHP, Google Plus, Facebook Pixel, Facebook, Nginx, Google Maps, jQuery UI, OWL Carousel, Cart Functionality, HTTP/3, Cloudflare CDN, CloudFlare, jQuery, Font Awesome, reCAPTCHA, Joomla, Apache, Twitter, Bootstrap, Microsoft 365
Company description: NĚCO PLUS je častým znakem pro snahu upozornit, že před vámi a pro vás existuje něco, co má v sobě užitek navíc. My v poliklinice Program Health Plus se staráme o vaše zdraví a přemýšlíme, jak to dělat s výraznějším efektem. Za posledních dvacet let jsme zažili úspěšnou snahu o zavedení nových léků, nových přístrojů i nových postupů. Medicína je dnes daleko účinnější, přesnější a méně invazivní, tedy i méně nepříjemná. Zažíváme tlak na kvalitu, léčba je určitě mnohem bezpečnější, komplikace jsou stále výjimečnější a ohledy na jednotlivce se dostávají více do popředí. Plošné screeningy, očkování, preventivní prohlídky a specifické cesty mohou, máme-li zájem je využívat, upozornit na velkou část nemocí ještě v zárodku, a tak nejen, že nepocítíme rušivě onemocnění, ale i léčebný proces. Přesto se často cítíme ztraceni v záplavě odbornosti, technologie a informací. Chybí nám partner, který by měl cílený zájem o nás, o naše přání, o naše pocity. Základem je individuální přístup – concierge medicine - plné soustředění na přání a potřeby klienta. Aby však tato služba byla opravdu nejlepší, je nutné mít možnost pracovat se všemi dostupnými informacemi. Cítíme, že vysoce erudovaný odborník s individualizovaným přístupem opírající se o digitalizaci všech informací, je zárukou úspěšné prevence, diagnostiky i následné léčby. A to umožňuje zachovat plné zdraví a kondici našim klientům.

Name: Pm Mkt.consulting
Company description: Siamo una start-up di consulenza in marketing in Liguria! Ciao, sono il fondatore di questa start-up! Mi chiamo Victor e sono 100% italo-brasiliano. Sono laureato in Marketing e in Comunicazione Istituzionale, ma ho un background che spazia dal bar alle risorse umane. Negli ultimi 4 anni ho lavorato come responsabile delle risorse umane in un’azienda che operava come call center per tutti i prodotti di Google per Aziende (Google Maps, Google My Business, Google AdWords, Google AWX, mSite, Youtube, tra altre) e anche per i servizi di concierge di Facebook ed Instagram. Vengo da una famiglia di imprenditori, dove ognuno sempre si è sforzato per farsi da sè, e ho imparato che una visione globale ed inclusiva è vitale per la creazione di ogni campagna di marketing, dove si deve conoscere il mercato e anche il prodotto per il quale si lavora. Per questo, mi sono impegnato per conoscere il mercato ligure, capirne la cultura, il modo in cui le cose sono fatte. E la verità è che sono davvero fiducioso di poter aiutare a portare le piccole aziende liguri nel mondo virtuale, lavorando con gli imprenditorI e potenziando le vendite, a partire dalla presenza online!

Company description: Im Jahr 2003 habe ich zusammen mit meinem Schulfreund Maik Weis die Agent CS GmbH gegründet. Mein erstes eigenes Unternehmen. Die weiteren Stationen: Kempinski Hotels & Resorts, O2/Telefonica, Ensys AG, Christian Bischoff LIFE GmbH und WIRKUNG Digital. Heute bin ich – wie du auf diesen Seiten lesen kannst – als Berater und Mentor für junge und ältere Unternehmer*innen  aktiv. Markenaufbau ist das Kernthema. Doch der Reihe nach: Nach meiner Ausbildung zum Hotelkaufmann und den darauf folgenden Vertriebs- & Marketingpositionen in der internationalen Hotelwelt (u.a. Kempinski Hotels & Resorts), gelangte ich als Key Account-Manager zum Telekommunikationsdienstleister O2. Kurz darauf schon war ich zu Zeiten der Liberalisierung des deutschen Strommarktes (spannende Erfahrung) für den Bereich Vertrieb/Marketing eines international tätigen Energiehandelshauses verantwortlich. Unterschiedlicher konnten die Branchen nicht sein. Der gemeinsame Nenner jedoch immer Vertrieb/Marketing und Unternehmensaufbau. Der lang gehegte Traum der Selbständigkeit ging mit Agent CS in Erfüllung. Agent CS war damals der erste deutschen Concierge Service/Personal Assistance Dienstleister und genoss von Beginn an die Aufmerksamkeit der Medien sowie international bekannter Privat- und Geschäftskunden (www.agent-cs.de). Und noch heute ist Agent CS mit seinem Expertenteam in den folgenden Bereichen aktiv: Personal Services, Reisen, Hobby & Freizeit, Familienservices, Healthcare & Wellness, Mode & Lifestyle, Event Management. Im Jahr 2008 lernte ich Christian Bischoff kennen. Ein Jahr später wurde die Christian Bischoff LIFE GmbH gegründet. Zusammen mit einem großartigen Team haben wir in den letzten Jahren eines der größten Seminarunternehmen im deutschsprachigen Raum aufgebaut (www.christian-bischoff.com). Schon immer interessierte mich das Thema Digitalisierung und die damit verbundenen Möglichkeiten und Innovationen. Das Ergebnis seit Beginn 2020, die WIRKUNG Digital GmbH.

Company description: Traveloveitaly's Concierge Service, stems from my desire to welcome, assist and advise the innumerable tourists arriving daily to visit Rome and its vicinity.  Since 1999, my many years of work experience in the Conciergerie of big European hotels such as the Cavalieri Hilton of Rome and the Marriott Grand Hotel Flora allowed me to grow and to develop an expertise in the hospitality industry. In 2006 I was entrusted the establishment, training and management of the “Conciergerie” of the Marriott Park hotel, the biggest hotel facility in Italy and the second biggest in Europe.  This experience allowed me to work with hundreds of tourists coming from all over the world. I quickly learned to select, negotiate and customize the services to satisfy customer requests.  My proven organizational skills in the hospitality industry, my deep love for my native city and my solid knowledge in the artistic-archeological areas, as well as my friendly, outgoing personality, give me an edge in customer service.  I’m well-informed, keeping up-to-date with service providers apt to answer different customer needs regarding business, social, religious and artistic events in the city. Our Tour Operators and Tour Guides are passionate and very knowledgeable and we collaborate with qualified archaeologists and professors. Our services are tailor-made satysfaing different needs: small group tour, family package journey or single need. We plan your Holiday in Italy as well in special world location. We organize really original tour alla over my native Rome discovering histories and unusual places. We offer services for your wedding cerimonies and for your honeymoon setting up original location and rich wedding list. We spend our energy to find every time the right solution for your travel wishes. Follow our web site www.traveloveitaly.com where you can find any updated information. WELCOME TO ITALY.

Acquamarina Resort is just 13km away from cosmopolitan Naoussa, 19km from Parikia (island port) and 16km from the airport. The beach is ideal for sports enthusiasts, as it is one of the most suitable beaches in the world for windsurfing. The idyllic location of the hotel allows guests to enjoy peaceful and relaxing holiday while at the same time it is within 5 minutes’ drive from the picturesque seaside villages like Pisso Livadi and Dryos and beautiful mountain Lefkes. Company description: Le groupe L’agence de voyage Dupont & Jensen est une société Luxembourgeoise créée  en 2017. Elle est la filiale de la société Luxembourgeoise Jeverk qui regroupe les sociétés suivantes : •	La société suisse IBC Aviation, spécialisée dans la location de jets d’affaires à travers le monde, qui possède une succursale en France et un bureau de représentation à Monaco, •	La société Square Strategy Services spécialisée dans l’intelligence économique et la sureté. Elle est la société sœur  de la société Square Strategy basée à Paris et de la société Atlas Development Consulting à Casablanca.  De plus, les dirigeants travaillent dans le milieu de la Conciergerie de Luxe depuis 15 ans. Cette expérience ultra exigeante a permis de bâtir un réseau mondial de relations sur lesquelles s’appuyer, mais aussi de constamment tirer vers le haut le niveau de prestations proposées.  De ces métiers très exigeants est né l’ADN qui est commun à l’ensemble de nos collaborateurs, à savoir un sens exclusif du service à la clientèle. L’agence de voyages Dupont & Jensen Dupont & Jensen est une jeune agence de voyages spécialisée dans la création de voyages sur-mesure personnalisés à destination d’une clientèle exigeante et désireuse de service haut de gamme. Son équipe est à l’écoute de ses clients pour les  conseiller dans l’élaboration de leur projet de voyage aussi bien sur le plan professionnel que personnel et, ainsi, mettre à leur service son savoir-faire. Dupont & Jensen répond aux critères légaux de la profession (membre IATA), possède les garanties financières nécessaires, et travaille avec le principal GDS, Amadeus.  La force de Dupont & Jensen L’agence se distingue par les avantages suivants : •	Un haut sens du service hérité de ses activités dans l’aviation d’affaires et la Conciergerie de Luxe •	Un réseau mondial de relations •	Une disponibilité 24/7 •	Un interlocuteur unique •	Une confidentialité à toute épreuve

Name: Andalucia With Me
Locations: [Spain, Andalusia, Marbella, 1 Avenida Cánovas Del Castillo]

Technologies: React, Font Awesome, CookieYes, reCAPTCHA, Google Tag Manager, jQuery, Google Analytics, Contact Form 7, Bootstrap, All in One SEO, Lodash, PHP, Google Fonts API, JSON-LD, Plesk, Moment.js, Isotope, RSS, TouchSwipe, WordPress, Nginx, MySQL, jQuery Migrate, MixItUp, oEmbed, Correos, Flat UI, Akismet, Google Maps, Google Font API
Company description: Somos Andaluces de nacimiento pero, sobre todo, Andaluces de corazón que hemos hecho de nuestra profesión una pasión, por eso nos gustaría mostrarte nuestra Tierra de una forma diferente y totalmente personalizada. Todo empezó hace unos años cuando nuestros amigos nos pedían que les organizásemos una “escapada especial” por Andalucía. Así empezamos a llamar a algunos familiares y amigos que tienen fincas, bodegas, cortijos…, para que les abriesen las puertas de sus casas y pudiesen visitar estos lugares y vivir con ellos una auténtica experiencia como si fuesen familia. Incluso ir con ellos a la Feria de Abril, hacer el “camino” hacia la Aldea del Rocío o subir el Río Guadalquivir en barco de vela o a motor hasta Sevilla. Recorrer a caballo impresionantes fincas privadas cruzando paisajes únicos, recibir un curso de flamenco en un auténtico cortijo andaluz o acudir a la famosa Semana Santa Sevillana y cenar en uno de los mejores Palacios de la Ciudad que pertenece a nuestra familia. También ofrecemos visitas privadas a la Mezquita de Córdoba y a la Alhambra de Granada, una experiencia única que muy pocos afortunados pueden disfrutar. Así es como nace ANDALUCIA WITH ME, una forma “familiar”, cercana y exclusiva de conocer la faceta más andaluza de esta maravillosa Tierra como si fueses de la mano de unos buenos amigos. Una ANDALUCÍA que no se encuentra por Internet. Te ofrecemos vivir una inolvidable “experiencia gastronómica Andaluza” recomendada por nuestro buen amigo Diego del Rio (*Michelin), que va desde comer en bares típicos de comida casera de gran reconocimiento hasta cenar en casas privadas de amigos o familiares donde podrás disfrutar de una exclusiva cata de vinos e incluso elaborar y embotellar tu propio aceite ecológico. Podrás conocer ANDALUCÍA desde el agua. Te ofrecemos participar en una regata con los actuales campeones del Mundo en la Copa del Rey de Palma o navegar a bordo del Desafío Español en la Copa América junto a sus navegantes. Andalucía tiene enclaves maravillosos para celebrar una boda y nosotros contamos con el asesoramiento de expertas Wedding Planners que darán siempre con la mejor localización y servicios para hacer de tu boda en Andalucía algo inolvidable. La Costa del Sol es un destino de Salud y Bienestar que cuenta con un reconocido prestigio Internacional. Nosotros te ofrecemos la oportunidad de aprovechar tus vacaciones para acudir a una de las mejores clínicas del País donde podrás someterte a cualquier tratamiento o intervención de la mano de los mejores profesionales. Todas estas experiencias podrías inmortalizarlas en fotos de la mano de Wayne Chasan, uno de los mejores fotógrafos del Mundo. Contamos con una equipo humano profesional y cercano que hará que tengas una estancia en ANDALUCÍA cómoda, fácil y segura. Nuestro equipo habla varios idiomas y contamos con un servicio de Concierge para hacer reservas en restaurantes, recomendar experiencias o solucionar cualquier contratiempo.

Company description: BeCharter is a company specialized in boat rentals designed to create unique experiences at sea. We offer a wide fleet of sailboats, motorboats, and yachts — with or without a skipper — for sailing, fishing, or simply enjoying the sea, tailored to both individuals and corporate clients. Our headquarters are located at Port Olímpic in Barcelona, with operational bases in Cambrils, L’Estartit, and Palma de Mallorca. Our fleet is 100% Beneteau, a world-renowned shipyard known for its quality, design, and reliability. We ensure a premium experience through continuous fleet renewal and rigorous maintenance, with a strong focus on safety and comfort. We also provide expert advice, technical support, and fast response in case of any issues. BeCharter is part of Guasch Group, a leading holding company with over 30 years of experience in the nautical sector. Our story began in 1995, offering seasonal rentals of small boats to holidaymakers. Since then, we’ve evolved into an innovative charter project, based primarily on a fleet from Beneteau Group brands, including Beneteau and Excess Catamarans. Discover more on our website and get ready to set sail.

With 2 to 10 comfortable cabins, professional crew, exquisite food, stunning destinations/vistas, exciting onboard and offshore activities including water sports, select ports to explore the local culture and natural beauty. Each cruise is tailor-made to create an unforgettable holiday JUST for you, your family/friends, or your group/company. We pride ourself on the knowledge of the local area and the Blue Cruise industry. All our gülets are carefully chosen based on their quality, safety, reliability, track record, crew, and the people and companies we work with.  Our Mission: To create an unforgettable Blue Cruise holiday for all senses Our Values: Our love for the Aegean & Mediterranean Sea Passion for cruising Pride and joy in our work/company Exceptional customer service Quality Safety Reliability Competitive prices* *We offer a BEST Price Guarantee on all our yachts. If you find a better offer on the same boat as us, we will match the lower price upon receipt of documentation. So you can book with confidence. We go the extra mile, acting as your personal travel concierge, to ensure that our guests visiting the Bodrum Peninsula and the beautiful Aegean/Mediterranean sea get an "unforgettable holiday". We interview each guest about their wishes and expectations for their holiday so that we can deliver what they want. We are happy to help with advice and ideas for your holiday, including pre and post cruise planning for hotels, restaurants, transfers, sightseeing/tours, and more. Our phones are open 24/7 in case of questions or emergencies. We look forward to creating your unforgettable Blue Cruise dream holiday and welcoming you on one of our gülets. Happy Cruising!

Company description: Crossing Collection is a boutique Italian hospitality group with two luxury properties and a family sailing product. Crossing Condotti, Crossing Collection’s boutique hotel in Rome has received widespread acclaim from prestigious travel media including Departures, National Geographic Traveler, The Sunday Telegraph, The Independent, Condè Nast Traveller and Louis Vuitton City Guides. Crossing Condotti is located a stone’s throw from the Spanish Steps and provides outstanding concierge service – our team have even helped out in staging an engagement or two. We are proud to have had Crossing Condotti selected for the shortlist of luxury hotels in Rome by some of the most respected travel agencies such as Mr & Mrs Smith and Tablet Hotels. Crossing the Rock is an exclusive luxury villa on the east coast of Sicily. This large house which literally sits right on the coastline was built in the 1800s and has been restored with designer furniture, fresh interiors and modern facilities. Guests can enjoy the panoramic terrace, the expansive garden or the swimming pool at their leisure. This property is managed in collaboration with The Thinking Traveller. Crossing the Sea is Crossing Collection’s most recent endeavour. Family Sailing provides all the comforts and conveniences of a boutique hotel but on a yacht. The truly unique thing about Crossing the Sea Family Sailing is the Kid’s Club housed on a separate boat where the children have all day sailing lessons, activities and games under the watchful eye of professional instructors. Guests can rest easy with the all-inclusive package, there is no need to worry about food, towels or even sunscreen. Family Sailing with Crossing the Sea offers hotel like service with hostesses on board who do daily housekeeping and a chef who prepares meals tailored to guests’ requests.

Company description: Let's go baby®, the first family concierge service in Portugal Let’s go baby was born out of a need in Vera’s family after traveling with their first baby. They had damaged and lost material, the hotels and local accommodations did not offered basic products for comfort, the rent-a-cars did not guarantee car seats suitable for the baby's age and had several extra airlines baggage fees. In October 2018 the online store was launched and the baby gear rental service was fully operational with more than 100 products allowing families to travel “light” and comfortably in Portugal. All products are purchased new directly from the brands and meet the highest safety and hygiene standards. The rental service is comfortable, safe and efficient, with maximum product quality and quick delivery, assembly and collection. We deliver where the customer wants, at the time they want. After several customer wishes, and months later Let’s go baby included a new supermarket and pharmacy shopping service (diapers, milks, hygiene, among others) to facilitate all the logistics of traveling with the youngest. For almost 2 years, partnerships have been established with tourism services such as transfers, babysitting, hotels and accommodation in order to, together, offer a better experience to tourists. In 2020, in the middle of a pandemic, Let’s go baby, besides needing, wanted to reinvent itself and became the 1st concierge service in Portugal for families, offering any type of product, service and solution that the family seeks. - baby equipment rental - babysitting - meal catering - supermarket and pharmacy shopping - local guides, transfers and personalized itineraries - health and wellness servicess Looking for other services? Just name it, we’ll have it for you. We offer a convenient, personalized and professional service and we work every day to help families with children travel through Portugal with no worries and with all the comfort they find at home.

Company description: Rome-based DRIVER IN ITALY, along with sister company MY ITALY CONCIERGE, serves the entire Italian peninsula from Piedmont and the Veneto in the north to Puglia and Sicily in the south. If you only need transportation (airport, rail station and seaport transfers, intra-city and intercity transportation), DRIVER IN ITALY provides excellent options. Our vehicles are late model, air conditioned and well-maintained, sized to your party and your luggage, from luxury sedans and limousines through minivans and buses. Our fully licensed driver-guides are the best in the business, fluent English speakers and highly trained, accustomed to Italy's unique traffic and road conditions. They are also available for corporate events, film scouting and logistics. Want more than just here to there? Book a driver-guide for fully fledged tours of Rome, any of Italy's cities or wonderful countryside excursions. Note: some of our tours are walking tours (e. g. the Vatican, but we can also pick you up from your accommodations!) Whether you choose the ultimate flexibility of private tours and transfers, or the economy of small group tours (8 persons max), traveling and touring with DRIVER IN ITALY means that you have the security of a long established licensed and insured company that can take you everywhere and show you virtually anything. We make Italy doable! Whether you want to see crowded and popular destinations with as little hassle as possible (of course we offer Skip-the-Line tickets!) or you want to venture out to rural wineries, archeological sites or remote mountaintop villages, we make it happen! Trust our expert advice and professional services. Our goal is your complete satisfaction!

Name: Lantana Concierge
Company description: We are a vacation concierge service. Perfect, relaxing vacations on the Costa Blanca, in Spain is what we arrange and organise. The where, the when, the how and the what, that takes the exhaustion out of researching and planning your vacation. We provide personally selected accommodation in villas and apartments, at excellent value for money. We offer quality experiences, such as, regional wine and food tastings, cooking classes, water-color painting, yoga, fitness, massage, kayaking, cycling, chartered boats and so much more. We work with experienced professionals, who LOVE what they do. We also organise the logistics to make your vacation even better, including reservations, private chefs, trained babysitters, fully-stocked kitchen options, and other concierge services, as requested. The location is Jávea, which is on the Eastern coast of Spain, between Valencia and Alicante and it is a hidden gem. It's off the beaten path, but well worth the experiences and value for money. Wonderful restaurants, beaches, nature paths, vistas and people. A great combination of Spaniards and internationals, seeking a better quality of life in one of Europe's 10 healthiest climates. No big hotels, skyscrapers or crazy nightlife. The company is Lantana Concierge. Lantana is a flower, composed of many small clusters of flowers. Just like our services – small details, which, when put together, make for one great vacation. It is jointly owned by two professionally and life experienced partners. One is an American-Latvian and the other is French. The hopes and expecations people place on a vacation are immense. It' s got to be the best, the most memorable, relaxing, adventurous, or romantic experience. We cater to all travellers, whether you are a single traveller, family, group of friends, interest group or corporate incentive traveller. Contact Lantana Concierge if you want a Tapas of Experiences vacation. The idea comes from the Spanish approach to eating tapas or appetizers– give many things a try, and when you taste something you like, order more. At Lantana Concierge, we work on the same principle, we organise as much or as little of what you love to do. +34 625 940 125, info@lantanaconcierge.com P.s. Lantana Concierge supports local businesses, artists and other professionals residing in Jávea by providing their services to individuals and groups seeking a perfect vacation.

Technologies: Joomla, Twitter Emoji (Twemoji), Tripadvisor.Widget, Google Font API, Cookie Information plugin, WPBakery, Yoast SEO, Google Hosted Libraries, Facebook, W3 Total Cache, Shopify, Tripadvisor Widgets, YouTube, HeadJS, Modernizr, Cookie Information, TweenMax, Twemoji, Open Graph, Debian, WordPress, RSS, Priority Hints, Apache HTTP Server, jQuery Migrate, MySQL, OWL Carousel, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, jQuery, Cookie Notice, Contact Form 7, Google Fonts API, Bootstrap, Element UI, Cloudflare CDN, CloudFlare, ShareThis, JetPack, Font Awesome, Apache, HTTP/3, oEmbed, Google Maps, HSTS, X-Content-Type-Options, Swiper, PHP
Company description: Il Bed & Breakfast La Taupiniere nasce dalla ristrutturazione totale di un antico cascinale piemontese e dalla passione di Silvana per l'accoglienza degli ospiti. Curato in ogni minimo dettaglio, La Taupiniere offre tre camere spaziose, ognuna con bagno privato e vista piscina, ampio salone per la colazione, terrazza, solarium, grande piscina e parcheggio privato.  Il B&B si trova a mezz'ora dal centro di Torino, e a 5 minuti da Pinerolo, ben collegato da bus e treno. I servizi di spostamento da e per la stazione sono gratuiti, così come i nostri servizi di concierge e prenotazione.  Si parlano inglese, francese e tedesco. Da 6 anni ormai vincitori del Certificato di Eccellenza Tripadvisor, ci impegniamo non solo a mantenere tali, ma a migliorare sempre i servizi, la pulizia, la qualità della colazione bio preparata da noi, e ogni minimo dettaglio che possa offrire un soggiorno indimenticabile.  Il Wifi è gratuito in tutta la struttura, i materassi di ultima generazione memory, riscaldamento autonomo in ogni stanza, e possibilità di colazione personalizzata, anche per i clienti celiaci.  Qualità e non quantità è il nostro motto. Vogliamo infatti mirare ad una clientela di élite che vuole solo il meglio, una piscina di 160 mt quadrati solo per se, una colazione personalizzata, e un trattamento familiare che permette di sentirsi a casa lontano da casa.

Name: Italy Bike Tours
Company description: Based permanently in Italy, we have built a reputation as one of the leading cycling operators in Europe. We’ve spent years putting together some of the most spectacular package tours throughout Italy, both the famous routes and a few that are unknown to all but ‘the locals’. The are many reasons why our clients but their faith in us to provide the perfect cycling holiday and we certainly aren’t the only company operating bike tours in Italy to chose from. however there are a few things that really set us apart from the competition. First is our expertise. Our teams are not only experienced guides and mechanics, they know their areas like their own back gardens. As such, we can show you the real beauty of undiscovered, authentic Italy. Next is our professionalism. We leave nothing to chance. Every eventuality is planned out, and even our back-ups have back-ups. Lastly, there is our dedication to our clients. At the end it is all about providing YOU with the perfect experience, no matter what it takes. Think of us not as guides, but as a roving concierge service. Just let us know what you want to experience during your stay in Italy, and we will do our best to make it happen! What’s important to you is important to us.

Company description: The EDGAR SRL is an innovative startup born from the founders of two projects in tourism industry. On the one hand, the core team of Guide Me Right, on the other one of 1000 Italy: two startups that aimed to bring authentic Italy to light, involving experts and enthusiasts throughout the country. EDGAR is the operating group in tourism sector and, to date, it includes two different products: - Guide Me Right: the marketplace of experiences that since 2014 has facilitated and moderated the meeting between Guests, curious travellers, and Local Friends, local people who share their interests by offering activities through the website. Today, Guide Me Right also gathers service providers for travellers and "local tips" given by local experts and professionals; - Edgar Smart Concierge: the digital concierge that allows travellers to satisfy all needs before, during and after their stay using just an App on their Smartphone. All affiliated accommodations can create their own App to download to their customers, who can discover and book internal and external services to the accommodation either independently or with the digital support of their facility on App. With Edgar Smart Concierge, managers of accommodations, on the one hand, can increase revenues by increasing the productivity of each customer and, on the other hand, to improve the quality of service and the satisfaction of the guest by transforming it into positive reviews for their structure. The EDGAR team therefore uses its tourism and digital experience to make it available to the major players in tourism industry, those facilities that want to take advantage of technology to return to play a central role in the relationship with a traveller who is always more digital and in search of authentic and customized experiences.

Name: Unique Slovenia / Custom Tour Designer
Company description: UNIQUE SLOVENIA is a tour designer offering custom made tours for a traveller who think travel is more about a unique, authentic experience – with personalisation, privacy, spiritual well-being and even simplicity as the overarching goals. The company was established to share our intimate knowledge of Slovenia with those travelers looking for unique travel experiences. We pride ourselves in being able to take clients to unique destinations, while proving the highest levels of personal service. We strive to do this with elegance and sophistication, exclusivness and individuality. Our goal is to consistently exceed our client’s expectations and personally ensure that every aspect of client's time with us is perfect.  We create specialised tours (wine and gourmet tour, cooking tour, active tours…), short breaks or getaways and custom made tours that are designed according to client's desire and budget. Luxury private jets to Slovenia or any other world destination with inclusive or exclusive custom voyages can be obtained for most demanding clients.  On the US market we  partner with Virtuoso member tour operators Travcoa and Frontiers International Travel. Lately we have established partnership with Searchlights, an incentive tour operator. In Great Britain we work closely with luxury tour operator Amazing Voyages.   Our motto »You name it, we do it« is literaly what we do. Slovenia is our country and we know it backward and forward. We know the best place to stand to get that perfect photography of Bled Island, how to beat the crowds in the popular summer months, and where to go when you want to get off the beaten path. Slovenia is full of secrets, too— hidden places most people don't know about. We've traveled the country from top to bottom innumerable times, so if there's something worth seeing, we know about it. Just consider us your personal concierge—wherever you want to go, whatever you want to do, we'll make it happen.

Located between Mlini and Srebreno, just a few minutes walk from the beach, our villa and its apartments and rooms are a mere 10 minutes drive from the historic Dubrovnik Old City. Villa Avantgade has a total of 12 newly constructed rooms and apartments designed to offer guests comfort and style during their vacation on the Dubrovnik Riviera. The villa’s inviting swimming pool is ideal for keeping cool during Croatia’s warm summer months and lies partly in the shade of soaring pine trees. Great care and attention has been given to the interior design of the villa and throughout the Villa Avantgarde there is a true Mediterranean feel with light colours and tasteful furnishings. Our meticulously renovated Villa Avantgarde accommodation presents the height of comfort with a total of twelve residences located over three levels, with air-conditioning and wi-fi internet access.  Villa Avantgarde is situated just ten kilometres from the historic Old Town of Dubrovnik but has the relaxed atmosphere of a pool villa being close to the Adriatic Sea, away from the crowds. The natural surroundings of typical Dalmatian flora and fauna offer complete privacy and relaxation. Rooms are comfortably designed as 4 star hotel rooms for guests that enjoy their hotel services such as room service, concierge, massage and private tours. Inside the Villa Avantgarde you have free garage parking, free Wi-Fi internet and swimming pool surrounded by pine trees. Complimentary sun loungers and umbrellas surround the outdoor swimming pool. The Villa Avantgarde also provides an outside kitchen, and BBQ facilities near the pool exclusive for use by our guests.  All of the apartments are equipped with splendid kitchens, balconies, air condition, living rooms and private parking. The apartments and rooms of Villa Avantgarde are made for guests having their summer vacation outdoors, dining in restaurants and enjoying nightlife and all of the other perks found on the Dubrovnik riviera; likely to be reserved by families with children, couples and friends using the comfort of kitchen amenities and bigger living rooms for a vacation spent with all possibilities like at their home.

Flexibilidad: siempre que lo desee usted puede hacer un uso libre de su propiedad. Tranquilidad: confirmación inmediata de sus reservas (24 horas) para eliminar la posibilidad de overbooking. Gestión integral: nuestra filial  www.villamanagement.es  ofrece una gama completa de servicios de su propiedad, desde la limpieza,  lavandería, entrega de llaves,  hasta el jardín y piscina, podemos hacernos cargo de la gestión de la propiedad al 100% para que usted no se tenga que preocupar de nada. Venta: si su casa se encuentra en venta o desea venderla www.villainvest.es  se ocupará de promocionar su venta!       En definitiva, somos una empresa joven, moderna y con amplia experiencia en el sector, siempre trabajamos por estar al día de todos los cambios tecnológicos,  redes sociales y nuevos canales de promoción para aplicarlo a  nuestras propiedades y obtener así el máximo de ocupación posible.     Nuestra finalidad, es que los huéspedes hayan tenido una experiencia positiva durante su estancia.

Company description: In einer globalisierten Welt, in der wir die Auswirkungen jeder Entscheidung, die wir treffen, in Echtzeit sehen können, verlangt die Tourismusbranche eine neue Art von Service. Jetzt sind die Verantwortung mit dem Ökosystem, die Effizienz in den Suchsystemen und die Transparenz in den Zahlungen wesentlich. Finitrip ist die Antwort auf diese neuen Bedürfnisse.  Mit einer eigenen Software, die speziell für Fincas-Ferienvermietungen entwickelt wurde, bietet Finitrip nicht nur eine schnelle und freundliche Benutzererfahrung, sondern ermöglicht es auch den Mitarbeitern der Agentur, ihre Arbeit auf komfortable und effiziente Weise zu erledigen. Ferienbauern-Fincas sind, im Gegensatz zu Hotels, Orte mit einer starken Beziehung zu ihren Besitzern, es sind Orte, die die Geschichte der Familie tragen und wo sie oft noch auf traditionelle Weise Produkte anbauen und herstellen. Finitrip schlägt eine fairere Art des Tourismus für Touristen und Eigentümer vor, bei der die Zufriedenheit und die Qualität der Dienstleistung für beide gleich hoch ist.  Eines unserer Ziele ist es, die Auswirkungen zu erkennen, die der Tourismus auf die gesamte Wirtschaft des Gastortes hat. Wir geben ihnen Sichtbarkeit und laden den Touristen ein, mehr als ein Tourist zu sein, wir laden ihn ein, Teil des Ortes zu werden.

Company description: Hey there! We're a concierge service for sailboat captains and yachting experiences. Our mission is to make the yacht rental process as convenient and risk-free as possible. Our company was founded in 2017 and has since evolved from a small charter agency into a modern, technology-driven startup. SEARADAR is headquartered in Vilnius, Lithuania, and our team of 30+ people works remotely from over 10 countries, including Portugal, Croatia, Poland, Serbia, Italy. We're actively growing and have expanded more than fivefold in the last two years, both in terms of employees and the level of service provided. Our clients are mainly from EU countries, US and UK. With experienced sailors among our founders and team members, we speak the same language as our clients and have a deep understanding of their needs. We work with charter companies virtually all over the world and have exclusive agreements and terms with many of them. We also have extensive information on how various charter companies are rated and our own lists of those we recommend and those we don't. Sometimes we're called a digital agent, because of our unique combination of top-notch customer service and advanced technology that allows us to process and provide our clients with yacht and charter company data that's not available on the open market. Customers praise the quality of our service. We have a rating of 4.9 out of 5 points on TrustPilot. We are building a community of people in love with sailing. Join us.

Company description: For more than 35 years (est. 1985), Meli Tours is a leading Destination Management Company and a B2B wholesaler offering a full spectrum of Destination Management and Handling services, utilizing its extensive local presence all over Greece and its own online (B2B) reservation system.  Meli Tours boasts an extensive network of branches and associates covering the Greek Mainland and Greek Islands on a 24/7 basis.  The network is supported by our international sales offices in Bulgaria and Romania. Meli Tours operates and distributes travel services in Greece to B2B customers worldwide in the following ways:  1. Accommodation: we are able to offer to our clients (Tour Operators and Travel Agencies) access to confidential B2B rates via our online Agent System, which they can use in order to make bookings with NET B2B rates and live availability. (Free registration here: https://portal.meli-tours.com/register.cfm). We are also able to distribute our products to other platforms via XML connectivity. 2. Transfer & excursions: we offer private and shared transfers and excursions in the most important Greek destinations with new and high quality vehicles, professional drivers at some of the best rates in the Greek market. We also offer to our clients our own Meli Tours representatives speaking fluently several languages. We can provide reps or guides upon request in any language all over Greece.  3. Tailor made services: Meli Tours operates a great number of itineraries & packages in the mainland of Greece and the Greek islands (Athens & Thessaloniki city breaks, Island Hoping, roundtrips in mainland Greece etc) and also in the Balkan Countries (Balkan roundtrips). Overall, what we offer to out B2B clients:  •	Accommodation Management (Hotels & Villas) •	Transfer Management & Excursions  (all Land Arrangements) •	Access to confidential B2B rates via our online Agent System  •	Group Itineraries  •	Special Vacations Packages  •	Luxury & Concierge Services •	XML connectivity

Name: Les Clefs D'Or Sweden
Company description: SHPF (Svenska Hotell Portier Föreningen) is the world’s oldest association of its kind and, from its founding in 1926, it has served to foster interest in the hotel industry and to increase the level of service in each hotel. The association is for those who work with guest and customer contact in hotels throughout Sweden. Our international members are all members of Les Clefs d’Or International and are concierge who work at many of the best hotels in Sweden. Easily identified by the golden crossed keys on their lapels, these members are an elite fraternity, globally connected, committed to professional development, and driven to setting new standards for guest service perfection. Company description: Seit über 10 Jahren sind wir Ihr erfahrener Vermietungspartner an der nordfriesischen Westküste.  Über Ferien an der Nordsee Wenn es um Urlaub zwischen Wind, Watt und Wellen geht, ist Inhaberin Wiebke Volquardsen mit ihrem Team bereits seit 2011 eine erfahrene Ansprechpartnerin – für Erholungssuchende wie für Eigentümer.  Heute werden von der Ferienvermietung mit Sitz in Husum sowie Zweigstelle in Dagebüll über 340 Objekte an der Nordseeküste Nordfrieslands betreut. Eine durchschnittliche Gästebewertung von 4,7/5 bürgt für den hohen Anspruch an Qualität und Service, den das stetig gewachsene Familienunternehmen lebt. So reichen seine Anfänge auf eine private Vermietungstätigkeit zurück, die sich schnell vom Hobby zum professionellen Geschäftsmodell entwickelt hat.  Entspannter und erfolgreicher vermieten Ferien an der Nordsee steht dafür, Eigentümer von Ferienwohnungen und -häusern zu entlasten, um mit weniger Aufwand mehr Gewinn zu erzielen. Von der attraktiven Objektpräsentation im Internet über die Buchung bis zur Abrechnung kümmert sich das engagierte Team um die Vermittlung, inklusive Reinigung und Gästebetreuung vor Ort.  Wer lieber selbst vermieten möchte, kann gegen eine monatliche Gebühr auf der Buchungsplattform von Ferien an der Nordsee inserieren und damit eine hohe Reichweite erzielen. Company description: At Luxury Key, we are established Mykonos - Tulum - Ibiza & Santorini luxury mavens and destination specialists; our unparalleled expertise and web of local networks empower us to curate your dream holiday into a tangible reality. A dream home & a Special event for you and your family.  Our company was founded by a driven duo of modern-day connoisseurs with extensive experience, having worked for the top Luxury Hospitality pioneers across Europe and the United States. Our standards are sky-high; we are committed to personalized, impeccable, anticipatory service with an emphasis on refined elegance. We specialize in exclusive, high-end luxury accommodations in the most sought after resorts in Mykonos, Tulum, Ibiza & Santorini. Each of the villas in our portfolio are handpicked private homes that were thoughtfully and tastefully designed to be lived in and comfortable. We can arrange a bespoke blend of a hotel and villa experience, allowing you to have the convenience of a hotel suite and its amenities near your preferred beach or restaurant – ensuring your stay will be a seamless and thoughtful one. At Luxury Key, all of the villas we work with are either newly built or recently renovated to the highest standards – this is a defining requirement to become a part of our collection. LUXURY KEY HOLIDAYS ~  We fuse the finest elements of an exclusive luxury holiday home with the world-class service and amenities of a five-star hotel to design the holiday of your dreams. LUXURY KEY HIGH-END CONCIERGE ~ The best of Mykonos – at your fingertips. Our high-end concierge team is ‘in the know’ and well connected and have their finger on the pulse of buzzing Mykonos and aren’t letting go.  LUXURY KEY WEDDINGS ~ Step into your own storybook wedding, we make your fairytale come to life.  LUXURY KEY REAL ESTATE ~We have a unique portfolio of land and properties for sale, whether it is a fully decorated villa, hotel or commercial retail property you are interested in

Company description: Welcome to 3els Barcelona. 3e Luxury Services is an incoming travel agency (DMC-Destination Management Company) based in Barcelona. We are specialists in tailor-made experiences and events and offer all kinds of incoming services -concierge- around Spain & Portugal. Excellence, exclusivity and expertise (the "3e") are our basic principles and we work continuously to ensure they are infused in all of our projects. However, at 3els, we offer much more than excellent service, we strongly believe that the real luxury is to offer experiences that give our clients goose bumps and, at the same time, respect and contribute to improve our environment. That’s why we are committed to Responsible Tourism collaborating with local NGO's and providing, as far as possible, an eco-sustainable service. 3els is composed of a team with a long experience in tourism and event planning. We design your tailor-made program with absolute professionalism and we offer 24/7 assistance in your destination. We take care of all the little details so the only thing you will have to worry about is enjoying your trip or event. As well as Barcelona and the rest of Catalonia, we also manage other destinations in Spain & Portugal such as Balearic Islands, Madrid, Andalusia, the Basque Country, Valencia and Lisbon, Porto or Algarve, among others. Tell us your wishes and we will work to make them come true. We hope to see you soon. Bon voyage. Rocío Gutiérrez Founder & CEO

Name: Le Collectionist By Bonder & Co

Company description: Le Collectionist by Bonder & Co is a luxury villa rental and concierge business that offers luxury experiences to clients. Each of our villas has been carefully hand-picked, and every service offered has been previously examined and tested. Ibiza, Formentera and Barcelona: we are experts in the destinations we choose. We strive for tailor-made experiences, going beyond customers expectations. How? Bringing expertise, working with passion and doing things to perfection.  From July 2017 Bonder & Co is part of Le Collectionist the first luxury European vacation property rental with unique experiences where together we plan create a new way to travel. Le Collectionist offers short-term rental on more than 2,000 hand-picked properties, and creates remarkable travel experiences for its customers in over 100 destinations. "Dream Makers, Life Perfectionists & Experience Creators"  Our Values Are Central To Our Mission and Culture...  1. Excellence 2. Passionate Driven 3. Honesty Matters  4. Team Players  5. More than Research 6. Multifaceted & Versatile  In 2009 Paloma Bonder founded Ibiza Solutions, the 1st luxury villa and concierge service in Ibiza. By 2012 her company was appointed the official supplier of American Express on the island, providing exclusive services to Platinum and Centurion members who were looking for exclusive luxury holidays.  In 2012 a major turning point occurred: Bonder & Co was born. Paloma Bonder and Mo Aljeda, former GM of L’Oreal Group and VP at Yves Saint Laurent, created a key partnership in transforming a boutique business into an ambitious luxury travel company.  In 2013 new HQ opened in the heart of Ibiza at the former official college of architects, a beautifully renovated and listed building. In expanding its horizons, Bonder & Co selected Formentera as a new luxury destination to offer clients, with its paradisiacal beaches and fine sand bliss.  In 2016 a new office opens in Barcelona in the golden mile surrounded by emblematic emails and luxury avenues. That same year Barcelona becomes a new exclusive destination with its cool lifestyle and modern vibe. In 2017 Bonder & Co unites with Le Collectionist the first luxury European vacation property rental with unique experiences where together we plan create a new way to travel. Le Collectionist offers short-term rental on more than 2,300 hand-picked properties, and creates remarkable travel experiences for its customers in over 100 destinations.

Company description: Chauffeur Ireland is a bespoke touring service for Ireland. We offer first class chauffeur/guided tours. We use a quality luxury fleet of Mercedes vehicles and we tour every part of Ireland in comfort and style. Our model is to offer you, our guest the best tour of Ireland possible. Our services are VIP, discreet and professional. We specialise in small group touring from two to six guests and we partner with all the top hotels and restaurants throughout the country. We offer VIP tours that we feel are unmatched in all of Ireland. All our tours maybe individually structured to each guest’s requirements. We cater for clients, who want to tour, sight-see, relax and/or golf. Our complete service includes meeting and greeting in the airport on arrival. Your own personal chauffeur/guide and vehicle throughout your stay. Our expert concierge service has over ten years in the hotel and tourism industry. We provide our clients with selections of the best attractions and dining options. An emergency twenty-four hour contact number is available for our guests during your stay. In Jan 2015 after a rigorous audit by the NSAI (National Standards Authority of Ireland) Goldstar Chauffeur Drive was the first Chauffeur Company in Ireland to achieve the Globally recognised ISO certification of Quality Management System to I.S. EN ISO 9001:2008 standard – This certification remains valid until 2018 subject to Goldstar being successful in the annual audits conducted by the NSAI. - Goldstar also achieved the ISO certification of Occupational Health and Safety Management System to OHSAS 18001:2007 (also valid until 2018 and subject to passing annual NSAI audit).

As a member of Virtuoso, the invitation-only conglomerate of the best travel professionals worldwide, we have the connections--and the clout--to turn even the shortest trip into a once in a lifetime experience. That means we sleep in every room, go on every tour, and sail on every ship. It's a work in progress, but we are constantly adding new reviews. Want a property vetted or looking for a review that's not yet posted? Let us know and we'll make it a priority.

Company description: Work hard, play hard, right? Then why does "play hard" often seem to involve so much work? Because if you want to have a great experience, you have to work hard to curate that experience. Vizu strives to make "work" and "play" mutually exclusive, indefinitely. Put simply, we want to make your social life easier. Without the noise. Without frustration. With intelligence. So, how do you curate these great experiences? First, maybe, you ask your significant other what they want to do. Then your friend group. Then some co-workers or classmates. Next, you count the number of "I'm down for whatever"-s and roll your eyes. Maybe you're "down for whatever" too, but what the f*ck does that even mean? Then, while you're getting that 3pm coffee to get you through the final work hours of the day, you faintly hear the words "tiki bar" from the back of the room and BOOM! Inception. It's going down.  But where is this so-called tiki bar? How is the music? Is there music at all? Can I roll through with all 8 of my friends? Do I need to reserve? Where should I go before? And what about after? Is there going to be a line out the door around the corner? The questions roll in. But who has the answers? Maria. How on earth did you forget to ask Maria? She knows all the hot spots. She knows my vibe. She knows what I like. She's always known best. She even goes the extra mile and make the reservation for you, puts you in contact with her friend who used to work the door. She's got the inside scoop. Here comes the zinger: Maria isn't a person. She's your artificially intelligent concierge for your social life on Vizu. Just ask, she'll do the hard work for you.

Company description: A SLIDE IN é um operador turístico e agência de viagens irreverente, dinâmica, jovem que reflete uma nova abordagem e visão na forma como concebe a sua oferta turística. É nossa ambição tornar viagens em experiências únicas e inesquecíveis. Refletimos nos nossos pacotes o que faz a diferença no momento da decisão: experiências únicas. A trabalhar no sector do turismo desde 2007, a SLIDE IN destaca-se por desenvolver um projeto vencedor de encontro às necessidades e exigências dos seus clientes, sendo reconhecida como uma das principais agências de viagem de programação e promoção junto do target jovem e snowtrips.   A SLIDE IN ocupa uma posição de liderança no mercado jovem vincada pelos seus programas inovadores, originais e divertidos. A organização de eventos e animação turística faz parte do leque de produtos oferecidos pela agência. Na sequência de uma procura cada vez mais elevada, por parte de vários segmentos de mercado, nomeadamente viagens desportivas, surftrips, viagens corporativas e M.I.C.E., temos como objetivo oferecer a melhor relação no binómio qualidade/preço, com uma resposta rápida e eficiente garantindo a plena satisfação de todos os clientes.   Em 2015, lançamos o desafio de criar uma nova marca na área de incoming. Com uma abordagem diferenciadora e eficaz na promoção turística de Portugal, assim surge a MY LISBON CONCIERGE, que pretende satisfazer os pedidos mais exclusivos e dar a conhecer o que de melhor o país dos descobrimentos e navegadores tem para oferecer em hotelaria, gastronomia, vinhos, cultura, história, shopping e animação noturna.   O SLIDEINTRAVEL.COM reúne um conjunto de profissionais experientes no sector de viagens, turismo e lazer, especialistas na área tecnológica e peritos em comunicação e media cuja finalidade é oferecer em qualquer momento as melhores soluções para as suas viagens, aliadas sempre à segurança, personalização e à comodidade das compras online. geral@slidein.travel

Det kan röra sig om hustillsyn av ditt fritidshus, en kock till din grillfest eller varför inte kontorsstädningen på ditt företag. Name: Maffex Travel
Technologies: Contact Form 7, WordPress, Flickity, Cloudflare Bot Management, Elementor, Cookie Notice, Apache HTTP Server, OceanWP, GetYourGuide, jQuery Migrate, Google Maps, CloudFlare, WhatsApp Business Chat, MySQL, WhatsApp Business, Google Font API, RSS, jQuery UI, jQuery, Apache, Font Awesome, Lightbox, Prototype, PHP, UNIX
Company description: Das Unternehmen Bei der Maffex Travel GmbH haben sich mehrere Spezialisten zusammengeschlossen. Dadurch können wir seit über 16 Jahren viele Bereiche Ihrer Reisewünsche abdecken.  Ob Buchungen von Pauschalreisen aller Anbieter, die Buchung weltweiter Flüge aller Airlines, Visaservice, Reiseversicherung, Chartern von Privatjets oder Hubschraubern, Chartern von Booten und Jachten, Mieten von Ferienhäusern, Ferienvillen – unser erfahrenes Reiseteam kümmert sich gern um Ihre Wünsche rund um's Thema Reisen.  Gestern Reisebüro - heute Reiseservice und Concierge Service: Das Angebot eines Reisebüros hat sich in den letzten Jahren erheblich geändert. Reiseservice oder Concierge Service beschreibt es eigentlich besser. Wir bieten Ihnen im Schnitt die gleichen Preise, wie sie im Internet angeboten werden. Dabei sind wir in vielen Fällen sogar günstiger, da bei den reinen Onlineplattformen oft noch viele Extras kostenpflichtig hinzukommen und sich der Reisepreis so sehr leicht erhöhen kann.  Doch erst wenn es zu Problemen kommt, werden Sie unseren Service zu schätzen wissen. Oder wir bewahren Sie im besten Falle schon vor Reiseantritt vor dem einen oder anderen Fallstrick, oftmals ohne das sie es merken.  Gerade in diesen verückten und unübersichtlichen Corona-Covid19-Reisezeiten werden Sie von unserem persönlichen Service profitieren. Wir versuchen das, was kaum noch möglich ist: Ständig auf dem laufenden zu sein und zu bleiben.  Viele Angebote und aktuelle Informationen finden Sie auf unserer Webseite unter www.maffextravel.de. Natürlich finden Sie Infos, Reisetipps, Reisenews und natürlich auch Reisewarnungen auf den heute üblichen Social Mediaplattformen, wie Instagram, Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter. Wir buchen:  Privat- und Geschäftsreisen Pauschalreisen aller Veranstalter Busreisen Flüge geschäftlich / privat   Gruppenreisen  Kur- und Wellnessreisen Städtereisen Ferienhäuser Privatflüge Jachten Wir übernehmen die Reiseplanung und Buchung auch für Büros.

Company description: There are approx 35,000 golf courses in the World but only 246 are true links courses. Six of these form the Sligo Links Swing, a  wonderful cluster of Links Golf along a majestic stretch of the Wild Atlantic Way Coastline in the North West of Ireland.   They are located on stunning stretches of coastline, nestled amongst magnificent sand dunes and with fairways of fine textured, tight turf for which links courses famed. Our mission in Dream Links is to help you discover the joy of Links golf in this part of the world and to enjoy the unique links experience during your time. 1. WE PLAN YOUR EXPERIENCE We plan your trip of golf and can provide a challenge match against  local members. Included in the plan are non golfing activities such as Catch and Cook boat trip around Sligo Bay. 2. WE SCHEDULE AND ORGANISE YOUR EXPERIENCE  We schedule it to meet your requirements and we schedule each element of the trip. 3. WE MAKE IT HAPPEN We operate a luxury concierge service from the minute you land untill you leave.

Company description: Goforworld to butikowe biuro podróży z licencją turystyczną. Działamy na rynku od 10 lat. O turystyce biznesowej i MICE wiemy wszystko. Obsłużyliśmy dziesiątki Klientów z różnorodnych branż, przygotowując wyjazdy firmowe w kraju i za granicą. Od kilkudniowych podróży służbowych, przez wyprawy motywacyjne premium oraz workshopy wyjazdowe. Odpowiadając na potrzeby rynku, w naszej ofercie rozwijamy realizację workations – wyjazdów łączących pracę z wakacjami. Dla pasjonatów podróży poza szlakiem organizujemy kilka wypraw przygodowych w roku. Wyruszamy w świat w małych grupach (6-12 osób). Nasze wyjazdy skupiają się na opowieściach, stojących za przewodnikiem i miejscem, które odwiedzamy. Chcemy pomagać odkrywać świat i lepiej go zrozumieć, nawet jeśli ta lekcja jest zawiła. Specjalizujemy się w wyprawach na Alaskę, do Australii i Nowej Zelandii, Wietnamu, Kolumbii i na Wyspy Zielonego Przylądka. Oferujemy usługę Travel Concierge dla Klientów biznesowych oraz osób prywatnych. Zajmujemy się kompleksową obsługą podróży. Szyjemy wakacje na miarę dla par, rodzin, grup przyjaciół, na specjalne okazje. Przygotowujemy spersonalizowane wyjazdy na zamówienie. Rezerwujemy bilety lotnicze oraz noclegi. Wystawiamy polisy ubezpieczeniowe we współpracy z naszym partnerem, Signal Iduna. Oferta biznesowa: ‣ Business Travel Management ‣ Workations ‣ Workshops ‣ Incentive Travel Oferta podróżnicza: ‣ Wyprawy w małych grupach ‣ Organizacja wyjazdów indywidualnych Usługi turystyczne: ‣ Bilety lotnicze  ‣ Ubezpieczenie podróżne Podróżowanie z nami jest bezpieczne. Jesteśmy zarejestrowanym organizatorem turystyki, mamy niezbędne dokumenty i oraz gwarancję Signal Iduna. Biuro podróży goforworld jest częścią Grupy Kuźniar Media, do której należy butikowa agencja kreatywna Kuźniar Media, dom produkcyjny treści audio premium VoiceHouse, platforma do personalizacji Funwisher. Goforworld było pierwszą firmą założoną przez Jarosława Kuźniara. To ona pozwoliła otworzyć nam skrzydła na świat.

Passend zu den Kundenwünschen werden die Erlebnistage aus über 150 Erlebnissen von einem Concierge kombiniert, organisiert und von über 70 sorgfältig ausgewählten Premiumpartnern durchgeführt.  erlieben grenzt sich klar von dem Massenangebot im Erlebnismarkt durch drei Alleinstellungsmerkmale ab: 1. Individualität: Die Erlebnistage sind perfekt auf die Paare zugeschnitten und werden immer für ein Paar durchgeführt.  2. Exklusivität: Jedes Erlebnis wird von den renommiertesten Anbietern der jeweiligen Branche durchgeführt und beinhaltet immer erlieben-exklusive Zusatzleistungen, die sonst nicht oder nur eingeschränkt erhältlich sind. 3. Rundum-Sorglos-Service: Ein greifbarer, persönlicher Concierge nimmt alle Aufgaben und Probleme ab und ist Ansprechpartner vor, während und nach einem Erlebnistag. Erlebnisse von erlieben sind für mehrere Zielgruppen interessant: 1. Paare, die sich wieder mal etwas Romantisches und Außergewöhnliches gönnen möchten. 2. Personen, die das perfekte Geschenk für den Partner oder ein anderes Paar im Familien- bzw. Freundeskreis, z.B. für eine Hochzeit brauchen. 3. Touristen, die bei ihrem Trip eine Stadt auf eine völlig neue Art und Weise erleben möchten. 4. Unternehmen, die individuelle Lösungen für z.B. Incentives oder Kundengeschenke suchen. Hinter erlieben steht ein starkes Team junger, kreativer und engagierter Unternehmer aus München. Die drei  Absolventen der Eliteuniversität TU München werden dabei von einer klaren Passion geleitet: Unvergessliche Momente für Paare.

We also offer customised concierge services such as restaurant recommendations and reservations, hotel bookings, tickets (trains, airplanes, museums, plays/concerts), and offer exclusive event planning services. Our special event planning services include weddings, wedding proposals, Bar and Bat Mitzvahs, honeymoons, professional retreats, and family reunions. Upon request, these can include the services of floral designers, catering, photographers, musicians, and many other elements. Our goal is to provide the best customer service from beginning to end, making vacation planning simple and rewarding. We custom design tours to meet the needs of all our clients so that they can experience their own 'Secret Door' to Italy. Every tour is designed to meet the needs of your group, whether you are a professional team, a family with children, a couple on a romantic holiday, or a single traveler. Company description: TravelConcierge, jest organizatorem turystyki, biurem podróży specjalizującym się w przygotowywaniu ekskluzywnych i niepowtarzalnych wyjazdów turystycznych "szytych na miarę". Przez blisko dekadę zdobywaliśmy wiedzę i umiejętności, w zakresie organizacji podróży. Obecnie przygotowujemy i realizujemy wyjazdy dla Klientów indywidualnych, grup, a także zajmujemy się obsługą firm w zakresie podróży służbowych i wyjazdów incentive. Możemy pochwalić się dziesiątkami zrealizowanych wyjazdów oraz rzeszą zadowolonych z naszych usług Klientów. Poza organizowaniem pakietów turystycznych, zajmujemy się również:    • rezerwacją biletów lotniczych, promowych i kolejowych;    • rezerwacją zakwaterowania;    • doradztwem w zakresie przepisów prawnych i wizowych;    • rezerwacją transferów;    • wynajmem samochodów, czarterem jachtów i samolotów;    • ubezpieczeniami turystycznymi;    • rezerwacją biletów na targi, kongresy, konferencje oraz wydarzenia kulturalne.   "Concierge" z definicji realizuje każde zlecone zadanie bez względu na jego charakter. W słowniku concierge nie istnieją słowa "nie", "nie da się", "nie można". TravelConcierge jest esencją naszej dotychczasowej pracy i doświadczenia oraz odpowiedzią na sygnały, jakie płynęły od Klientów. Zajmujemy się organizacją usług w zakresie szeroko rozumianej turystyki. Rezerwacja stolika w restauracji w Buenos Aires, bilet wstępu na pokaz mody w Nowym Yorku, koncert w Londynie, przygotowanie podróży po wymarzoną suknię do Paryża, czy sprowadzenie do Polski luksusowych produktów niedostępnych na rodzimym rynku to zadania, które z przyjemnością zrealizujemy.   Pozostajemy do Państwa dyspozycji i zapraszamy do kontaktu. Tomasz Woźny – Prezes Zarządu TravelConcierge – at your service

Company description: About us: We are a boutique-type law firm with a special focus on private clients and family businesses. We advise our clients on transactional law, transformations and restructurings, establishment of holding structures, optimization of exit from companies, and architecture of trust funds. Mezi naše klienty patří významná česká podnikatelská uskupení, rodinné firmy či individuální podnikatelé a investoři. Name: Shyer AS
Technologies: Google Font API, Amazon Web Services, jQuery, Apple iCloud Mail, Google Tag Manager, Google Hosted Libraries, CloudFlare, Google Analytics, Cloudflare Bot Management, HTTP/3, Webflow, HSTS, Google Maps, Microsoft 365, Google Fonts API, Unpkg, Open Graph, Swiper
Company description: Shyer ble etablert i 2021 av gründere med bakgrunn fra noen av Norges største IT-miljøer. Vi ønsket å gjøre ting annerledes: flytte fokuset fra generiske løsninger til ekte service og teknologi som faktisk virker. I dag er vi den eneste IT-partneren i Norge med et tydelig spesialfokus på hotell- og overnattingsbransjen. Vi kjenner hverdagen til hotellsjefer uten IT-avdeling, driftssjefer med hundre baller i luften og ansatte som bare vil at alt skal fungere. Men vi stopper ikke der. Teknologien vi bygger for hoteller fungerer like godt i bygg og eiendom generelt, fordi kravene til stabilitet, sikkerhet og brukervennlighet er de samme. Er det godt nok for en heldigital hotellkjede, er det godt nok for de fleste næringsbygg. Vårt oppdrag er enkelt: Vi bygger teknologien som får opplevelser og bygg til å skinne, og folk til å komme tilbake. Det betyr stabile nettverk, skjermer og systemer som spiller på lag med menneskene som bruker dem, og som gjør hverdagen enklere, ikke mer komplisert. Når innsjekken stopper opp, skjermene henger eller nettverket faller ned, er vi de som står i kulissene og får alt til å flyte igjen. Vi er små nok til å være alltid på hugget, og store nok i erfaring til å levere på nivå med – eller bedre enn – de største aktørene. Kort sagt: Vi er bransjens IT Concierge🫡☁️

Company description: Founded in 2006 as a consumer service, Borderlinx changed the way people shopped around the world by providing the freedom to purchase from any e-commerce site. Today, Borderlinx is the market leader in B2B solutions and B2C services for e-commerce sites. Go.Borderlinx Global E-commerce Solutions | B2B SaaS Go.Borderlinx works directly with retailers to alleviate the complications that come with international shipping demands. The company’s cross-border e-commerce platform seamlessly integrates into a retailer’s checkout process to offer customers cost transparency and a hassle-free experience, no matter where they are in the world. The Borderlinx software intelligently calculates duties and taxes and balances customs compliance and product restrictions.  Borderlinx.com Shop & Ship Worldwide | B2C Subscription Service Borderlinx is transforming how people shop online by eliminating international shipping restrictions to their country. Customers can shop stores from any eCommerce site around the world using their very own forwarding address in the U.S., U.K., Hong Kong and Germany. Borderlinx offers a variety of services to save customers on shipping costs including a calculator for taxes and duties, personal shopping concierge service and package consolidation and repacking.

The James & Rita Guest App now allows guests to easily check-in and check-out, open their room door, order room service, book a table at one of the restaurants or pay for any services. With James & Rita our clients observe significantly lower operating costs and higher revenues thanks to enhanced cross-selling opportunities and guest satisfaction. Major hotel chains worldwide already trust our solutions.

Company description: Charamel is a IT company based in Cologne/Germany. The company vision is to bring more human touch into interactive applications by using virtual humans called avatars. Charamel is developing software for interactive and multifunctional digital assistants for a better communication between human and machine. Avatars are the next generation of a multimodal and user-friendly HMI interface face to face! Charamel offers a variety of software products and services.  - Digital Avatar Solutions like Digital recepionist, Concierge or Check -in Agent - Automatic AI-based Sign Language translation products and service for text to sign language (www.gebaerdensprach-avatar.de) - Virtual Trainer (www.virtual-trainer.de) is an innovative cloud-based training solution for legally prescribed trainings for companies to instruct ther employees in occupational safety, fire safety, energy, hygiene and other contents. It enables the visualization of digital assistants, chatbots, AI-systems and helps to increase the user experience. Using emotions, movements and speech the avatar is able to interact in real-time with users. - R&D -  Additional research and development work in collaboration with partners sponsored by the European Commission or the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research provide new experiences and developments in artificial intelligence and help Charamel shape the future. Ask us for further information!

Company description: Welcome to Klingle – The Future of Hospitality Service! Klingle is revolutionizing the hospitality industry with an innovative digital concierge solution that redefines guest experiences while streamlining operations. Our QR-code-based system enables seamless communication between guests and hotel staff – intuitive, fast, and efficient. What Makes Klingle Special? 	•	Easy Communication: Guests can scan a QR code to request services – from room service orders to spa bookings – with requests automatically routed to the appropriate departments. 	•	AI-Powered Assistance: Our AI answers frequently asked questions 24/7, such as dining hours, spa locations, or local recommendations, ensuring smooth information flow. 	•	Targeted Upselling: Klingle provides guests with personalized recommendations for upgrades, packages, or exclusive experiences – a great way to increase per-guest revenue. Benefits for Hotels: 	•	Boost Efficiency: Automated task management reduces workload and optimizes internal workflows. 	•	Enhance Satisfaction: Fast, accurate responses and personalized care leave guests delighted. 	•	Increase Revenue: Leverage targeted upselling opportunities to maximize guest spending potential. 	•	24/7 Availability: Klingle is always on, even when staff are busy or unavailable. Our Vision: We aim to elevate the hospitality industry worldwide, from luxury hotels to boutique bed-and-breakfasts. Klingle represents seamless processes, happier guests, and increased revenue. Discover how Klingle can transform your hotel. Contact us for a demo or to explore a pilot project – we’re excited to revolutionize the guest experience with you!

Name: Der Schnittstellen-Concierge
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Bad Pyrmont, 4-6 Dieselstraße, 31812
Company description: Wir von ProduktivSoftware nehmen die Rolle des Concierge für E-Commerce-Schnittstellten ein.  Als Partner für Fulfillment-Unternehmen, übernehmen wir die Anbindung neuer E-Commerce-Kunden an ihr System. Nach unserer einmaligen Entwicklung einer Schnittstelle zur Fulfillment-Software, muss sich der Fulfillment-Anbieter um die Anbindung weiterer Kunden nicht mehr kümmern, denn das übernehmen wir für ihn. Neben der eigentlichen technischen Anbindung, sorgen wir darüber hinaus vor allem für eine reibungslose Abstimmung mit den unterschiedlichen Shopbetreibern. Ergebnis ist eine Skalierbarkeit die Spaß macht und von der das Unternehmen langfristig profitiert. Sie wollen nicht jeden Onlineshop einzeln an Ihr Fulfillment-Unternehmen anbinden? Müssen Sie auch nicht. Wir bringen E-Commerce und Fulfillment zusammen. Über digitale Schnittstellen binden wir die Onlineshops und Marktplätze Ihrer Kunden an die Software Ihres Fulfillment-Unternehmens an. Dabei übernehmen wir nicht nur die technische Umsetzung, sondern vor allem auch alle für die Projektkoordination erforderlichen Absprachen mit Ihren Kunden.
