Company description: Wiilo is a personal assistant for all things related to traveling by bus in Romania. We provide seamless travel experiences for busy professionals & frequent travelers. We make travel planning as easy as possible so that everyone can enjoy the comfort of a carefree travel. Powered by Artificial Intelligence and human experts, we’re a 24/7 concierge specialized in traveling by bus. Travel like a VIP and we’ll handle all booking, rescheduling, cancellation, and everything in between. * Personalized travel We’re essentially a personal travel agent in your pocket. Let us know what type of trip you would like and the choice of your destination. We’ll ask a few questions and devise the perfect travel itinerary. Let us know your ideal trip and we’ll reserve everything for your convenience. * Life savers and time savers We’ll help you save time by handling all the travel research and bookings for you. We even simplify your booking process by hand-picking the 3 best options that suit your needs — such as highest rates, lowest price, and preferred bus tickets. Wiilo will take care of the research and offer you options to compare.  * Chat with Wiilo We’re a personal assistant that you can text message. Simply ask a question whenever and wherever you like and we’ll engage in conversational style just like human agents would. The more you chat, the smarter we get. We’ll learn your traveling taste or personal style and send recommendations for buses. And always remember that we’re traveling in real-time with you, in your pocket, for any endeavor that may arise. * Travel with confidence Wiilo caters to all your concerns and needs 24/7. We ensure the highest quality and most accurate bookings. We’re always traveling in real-time with you and are just a tap away. We’ve got your back if there’s ever a change in your travel itinerary regarding buses. Personal shopping at your fingertips.

We create this security together with you - through practical training under real conditions. Our European team of experts combines decades of experience in digital defense. When you sign up, you receive pages -- Blloon's in-app currency. With your pages, you can redeem 1-2 books (depending on a book's length) from the Blloon catalogue. You can earn more pages by sharing Blloon with your friends or by giving feedback. You can also purchase top-up pages from the App Store.  If you enjoy reading on Blloon, subscribe! We offer a flexible & extremely affordable subscription scheme for our users. You can subscribe for just £3.99 per month to receive 500 pages/mo or for just £6.99 a month to receive 1000 pages/mo. The innovative pages payment system makes sure you get the best value for money; pages roll forward from month to month so you can use them when best suits you.  http://blloon.com/

Name: Art Surrogacy And Egg Donation
Technologies: InMotion Hosting, InMotion Hosting DNS
Company description: Art Egg Donation, a young, dedicated and caring egg donation agency, is founded by fertility professionals. We are centered in both Europe and Asia.In Art Egg Donation, we offer customized and diversified solutions for those intended parents who are searching qualified egg donors and gestational carriers to help complete their dreaming families. Since 2014, we’ve been helping answering questions and giving advice on egg donation and surrogacy for intended parents worldwide. But we quickly realized because of language barriers, culture shocks and the shortage of medical or juridical information, most people who got information from us were still not able to travel abroad and complete the fertility treatments by themselves. Meanwhile, due to countless misleading commercial information online, people got lost when making decisions. In order to help more families fulfill there parenting dreams, we decided to initialize building transparent, ethical and affordable egg donation , surrogacy and concierge programs to meet the unique needs and inquiries from the intended parents. Company description: Home Cleaning Services est une filiale du groupe WINAVI. Elle a été créée en 1971 à Bruxelles et a évoluée au fur et à mesure.  Aujourd'hui elle est l'acteur incontournable du nettoyage d'entretien, ponctuel et de remise en état aussi bien pour les entreprises que pour les particuliers. En effet, nous sommes spécialisés dans le nettoyage de maisons, bureaux, communs d'immeubles ou encore surfaces commerciales. Nous fournissons également des services d'entretien occasionnels tels que le nettoyage de tapis, de tissus d'ameublement, de vitres, etc. Avec plus de 45 ans d’expérience et grâce à la fidélité de nos clients, nous avons poursuivi notre développement afin de proposer un programme complet de services facilitaires. Aujourd’hui, parmi nos filiales nous comptons également:  Housekeeping & Cleaning Services : Activité entièrement dédiée aux hôtels proposant des services d’entretien et sur mesure. Des solutions pour l’entretien de votre établissement, la gestion des minibars et « amenities », la mise en place de votre personnel d’accueil ou du service petit déjeuner…  1 Titre des Services : Assure le nettoyage de votre domicile, la lessive, le repassage ou encore la préparation de repas en titres-services. Compte plus 1000 clients et 200 aide-ménagères fiables et extrêmement compétentes.  Handy Belgium : Réalise sous contrat ou de manière occasionnelle des petits et grands travaux chez des particuliers ou en entreprise. De la plomberie à la menuiserie, en passant par la peinture, nos professionnels répondent à tous vos besoins.  Hospitality Management and Facility Services : Regroupe toutes les activités liées au Facility Management, l’accueil de vos clients ou le bien-être de vos employés. Une conciergerie B2B et B2C est également à votre disposition. Nous prenons en charge l’accueil, la gestion du courrier ou encore l’achat de fournitures. Mais également l’organisation de vos salles de réunion, le catering et choyons votre personnel ou vos clients…

Nuestra filosofía es proporcionar artículos de calidad, cuidando mucho la higiene de los mismos y ofrecer un servicio de atencion al cliente rápido, efectivo y excelente. Notre mission est d'améliorer l'efficacité de vos collaborateurs en apportant du soleil en entreprise et en les libérant des tracas du quotidien.  Les études ont démontré que le stress coûte environ 3750€/employé/an. Parmi les sources de ce stress, le manque de temps et la difficulté à concilier vie privée et vie professionnelle. no soucy! contribue à réduire ce stress en prenant en charge la résolution des tâches quotidiennes. no soucy! est interlocuteur privilégié pour l’entreprise et ses collaborateurs. Name: Rent & Relocation Bcn

Company description: Servicios de Relocation, Concierge y alojamiento temporal destinados a ejecutivos y empresas. En Rent & Relocation Bcn ofrecemos servicios a expats que se trasladan a Barcelona durante periodos largos o indefinidos; nosotros le asesoramos en su traslado a la ciudad, para facilitarle todos los trámites y gestiones, tanto individuales como familiares, y hacer que su adaptación sea rápida y lo más cómoda y grata posible. Podrá disfrutar de la ciudad desde el primer día mientras resolvemos sus necesidades e inconvenientes, para que su mudanza y acomodación sean un éxito. Además si su visita a Barcelona se debe a unos días de vacaciones, a negocios, a congresos o ferias, un tratamiento médico, le ofrecemos la mejor opción de alojamiento para estancias cortas en apartamentos de la más alta calidad en los mejores emplazamientos de la ciudad.  Ofrecemos también un amplio catálogo de servicios - concierge services - que le ayudarán a disfrutar durante su visita, sea ésta de negocio o placer, y durante todo el año, en la ciudad.

Company description: Maggiordomus | Soluzioni di Concierge Aziendale per il Benessere e la Produttività Maggiordomus è la prima azienda di servizi in Italia dedicata alla risoluzione di tutti i problemi della vita quotidiana. Non solo privati, Maggiordomus è anche concierge aziendale, un servizio strutturato pensato per migliorare la qualità della vita dei dipendenti e ottimizzare il tempo in azienda. Supportiamo le imprese nella creazione di ambienti di lavoro in cui le persone possano sentirsi valorizzate, serene e più produttive, contribuendo al successo e alla competitività aziendale. Offriamo soluzioni su misura, integrabili nei programmi di welfare aziendale, che includono: Servizi personalizzati: dalla gestione di commissioni quotidiane alla prenotazione di viaggi, fino al supporto nella cura della casa e della famiglia. Consulenza dedicata: per sviluppare piani flessibili che rispondano alle esigenze specifiche dei dipendenti e degli obiettivi aziendali. La nostra missione è chiara: trasformare il tempo in valore. Liberando i dipendenti dalle incombenze quotidiane, permettiamo loro di concentrarsi sul lavoro con maggiore serenità e soddisfazione personale, contribuendo al miglioramento delle performance aziendali e al rafforzamento del brand come Employer of Choice. Collaboriamo con aziende di ogni settore e dimensione, offrendo un servizio che si distingue per professionalità, attenzione ai dettagli e un approccio orientato alla sostenibilità e all’innovazione. Scopri come Maggiordomus può aiutarti a creare un ambiente di lavoro unico, in cui il benessere delle persone diventa il motore del successo aziendale.

Company description: Valerie and Paul both worked long hours as consultants and when they had their two boys things started to pile up at home. Instead of taking on all these tasks, they preferred to spend time with their children. This is how their third child, Extra Time, was born in 2005. Initially offering a range of services around the home and family to save their clients time for the things that really matter to them . In 2007, a set of services was added to save time at the office. Their concierge services, for example, contribute to a better work-life balance and a free mind to concentrate on the work at hand. In 2010, based on discussions with some clients, Extra Time decided to expand its  services to corporate clients. Extra Time pro aims at saving businesses time by taking over a range of support tasks allowing them to concentrate on their core business. Our latest addition is Extra Time talents. As all our activities are based on finding the best match between the requirement of our clients and the professional providing the service, we built up our expertise to attract, recruit, retain and grow people and now provide these services to our clients. Our journey has allowed us to provide high quality personalized services by being employee and customer centric. Our vision is to give each person the time to pursue their dreams and thus contribute to their development. Our mission is to save you time every day for the things that really matter to you. Our job is to find the right skills at the right time

Company description: Hospitality off the beaten track! Feel the essence of local! A TRAVEL EXPERIENCE BY URBANAUTS As an innovative and modern hotel operator with locations in Austria, Italy, France, Germany, it is important for us to create individual, tailor-made solutions for our properties. Each accommodation is unique, becomes part of the place and offers guests the best opportunity to immerse themselves and experience "The Essence of Local". An online concierge service, specially developed with the Viennese startup Staymate, offers full independence.  Through innovation and experience, we are highly specialized niche operators for businesses under 60 units (such as small and micro businesses, former family businesses). Already with the Viennese grätzlhotels, founded in 2012, we were able to demonstrate our expertise for the use of vacant real estate and thus revitalize former business premises in the ground floor zone. We have made it our goal, in the spirit of social and ecological sustainability, to maintain existing buildings, to preserve the stories of the houses or to continue them in a modern, adapted form. Through individuality and innovation, no two hotel rooms are alike. In this way, different requirements can be met.  - We create accommodations: for business travelers, couples or families, in the city and in the country, at home and abroad, an URBANAUTS STUDIO or a HIDEAUTS hotel - We create independence: an online concierge offers full service without time commitment - We create a community: the good network of Fellows invites to become part of the city - We create modern workplaces: flexible, far away from the classical job in a hotel

Name: Townhouse Retreats S.L. Marbella
Company description: Townhouse Retreats is a stunning house restoration, 15 minutes from the centre of Marbella and 7 minutes from Puerto Banus. We offer people who choose to travel to the Costa del Sol for surgery, a safe and discreet place to stay while they recuperate, before they travel home.  The exclusive nature of our accommodation means that there are never more than two guests staying at any one time, with the option to be the only guest for an additional surcharge. A 5 star concierge service is offered, along wth private transfers to and from clinic appointments and the airport. Holistic therapies, hair and beauty appointments can be arranged in the comfort of your private room. Townhouse Retreats offer a peaceful and tranquil environment in luxuriously appointed rooms, with stunning sea and mountain views, large private terraces and a small garden to sit in. The perfect place to relax, recuperate and recover post surgery.

From day-to-day tasks, basic household errands, organising travel arrangements, property management, bookings, chartering birthday yachts to networking events. By leveraging industry connections and preferential relationships with our extensive network, we have the resources and knowledge to carry out any request to your exact specifications. We will streamline your existence, allowing you to make the very best of your precious time. We offers a truly bespoke concierge service, which is thorough, informed and discreet, through which it will become each member’s very own little black book granting access to a whole new world. The Little Black Book takes great pleasure in recommending and making reservations at the very finest hotels, restaurants and at the hottest bars, clubs and spas. Of course, should you require a personal trainer to shape up, a well-educated nanny for the children or a top-notch, reliable cleaner - we know where to find just the one. Our ambition is to exceed members’ expectations by affording privileges and access to unique experiences and events. Each member is assigned an intuitive, dedicated Lifestyle Manager who will provide a bespoke concierge service and, not only establish a strong rapport, but also a deep understanding of the individual’s lifestyle requirements. Allow The Little Black Book exceptionally bespoke concierge service to streamline your life.

Our dedicated Concierge service will tailor make local experiences for our guests, from local Alentejo wine tastings, guided bird watching walks, bike tours across the rice fields to local villages and trekking in the Serra of Grandola.  “AlmaLusa Comporta is mindful of our carbon footprint and is seeking to be a sustainable destination as is possible. Company description: Hotel Diffuso a Montalcino, dall'idea di Andrea & Lisa nasce nel 2011 il primo hotel diffuso a Montalcino. La struttura si snoda in prevalenza nel centro città, 5 appartamenti self catering con piccola piscina,bagno turco e idromassaggio, impreziosito dal suo panoramico e rigoglioso giardino tutto rigorosamente nell'anfiteatro del centro storico di Montalcino. Montecaprili invece è una casa colonica costruita nel 1774, composta da 5 appartamenti di grandi dimensioni, completamente ristrutturati ed attrezzati, immersi nella campagna di Montalcino a 4 km dall'abbazia di S.Antimo ed a 8 km dal centro storico. Una piscina "clorine free" di 17mt x 9mt rendono questa struttura unica nel suo genere. Accoglienza, Cortesia e discrezione oltre ad un servizio di concierge personalizzato, rendono i nostri servizi ed appartamenti unici ed esclusivi. Suite D'Artista, a soli 5  minuti a piedi della via pedonale della città. e Montecaprili a 10 min di macchina Lisa & Andrea saranno felici di condividere le loro migliori esperienze per rendere il vostro soggiorno indimenticabile.

Affianchiamo aziende, brand e organizzazioni nella realizzazione di eventi di alto profilo, garantendo competenza, creatività e affidabilità. Grazie al nostro network di professionisti e sponsor, siamo in grado di proporre soluzioni innovative, concept out of the box e collaborazioni internazionali che soddisfano le esigenze anche del cliente più esigente. Il team di ALL4U crea dei contesti e spazi empatici ed emozionali con l'obiettivo di facilitare business e creare occasioni di networking per veicolare opportunità d'investimento e attività B2B e B2C. Name: I-frontdesk

Company description: i-frontdesk is a young and promising start-up based in Munich, Germany. The idea of installing a multilingual virtual concierge on a touch tablet screen for every hotel room was the experience-outcome of the CEO and co-founder, Dorna Hekmat, managing a Boutique Hotel without a concierge for several years. The necessity of solving the problem and fact of the increasing trend of hotels practically rationalizing away "the heart of the hotel" in other words the position of THE CONCIERGE brought up this solution. Also hotels with an existing concierge can very well use this system in order to optimise the internal processes and level of service for their guests. With the support of three friends, profoundly experienced in mobile connectivity solutions and strong entrepreneurial skills, she managed to set up i-frontdesk and be one of the nine winners of the Telefonica incubator "Wayra" Germany in August 2012! Our vision is to make it possible for every progressive hotel providing their guests with a tablet device beside the bible on the desk welcoming them in their room and making their stay as pleasant and exciting as possible. Our Greek luxury hospitality company offers guests a vacation in the privacy of a villa without having to give up the luxury services of a 5-star hotel. We also know that you like your independence and freedom, so if you need us we are here 24/7 and when you do not, we respect your privacy.  BlueVillas was awarded “Best Serviced Villas in Europe” 4 years in a row (2016, 2017, 2018 & 2019) and was invited to join the Traveller Made® network, where the very best travel designers of the world unite! We are also proud to present our CSR Program, Holidays for Humanity, supporting the homeless in Athens in cooperation with the non-profit organization EMFASIS.  In short, we offer hand-chosen villas, 24/7 bespoke services, qualified villa consultants, concierge teams with extensive local knowledge, and exclusive experiences.  BlueVillas is with you every step of the way to the perfect Greek island vacation.

Ke každému apartmánu náleží jedno podzemní parkovací stání a sklepní kóje pro uložení sezónního vybavení. Další dvě samostatné budovy pak budou vyhrazeny službám prvotřídního horského hotelu – recepci, službám concierge, wellness & spa, snídaňové lounge, restauraci s vinným barem nebo vlastní pekárně. Aldrov Apartments & Resort se nachází doslova několik metrů od skiareálu Aldrov ve Vítkovicích v Krkonoších, který nabízí celkem pět sjezdových tratí všech stupňů obtížnosti a dva vleky včetně čtyřsedadlové lanovky. K dispozici je zde i dětský vlek a lyžařská škola. V dojezdové vzdálenosti 10 minut autem nebo skibusem leží Špindlerův Mlýn, který bude od roku 2021 propojen s Hromovkou a Svatým Petrem, čímž vznikne největší lyžařské středisko českých hor s celkovou délkou sjezdových tratí 40 km.

Company description: Società fondata a luglio 2013 Driope si occupa di fornire ai suoi partner un servizio chiavi in mano per gestire in modo professionale il processo commerciale, operativo ed amministrativo che soggiace alla messa a reddito degli immobili con la formula degli affitti brevi e medi.  Nel 2021 Driope registra il marchio UR NEST Serviced Apartments, il cui sito (www.URNEST.it) è una vetrina dei circa 80 immobili gestiti tra Milano, Bologna e Firenze e dei numerosi servizi complementari al soggiorno che l’azienda è in grado di offrire tramite partner selezionati. UR NEST Serviced Apartments si propone di offrire un servizio di ricettività para-alberghiera avanzato, che metta a disposizione degli ospiti esperienze sul territorio, conciergerie, servizi di delivery e di assistenza domestica.  Il sito è dotato di un front-end dedicato agli ospiti, dov’è possibile consultare la descrizione dettagliata di ogni appartamento completa di foto di ogni ambiente, nonché finalizzare direttamente online la propria prenotazione, completandola con una vasta gamma di servizi.  Il back-end è stato creato per ottimizzare il costante impegno nel revenue management. Le sue funzioni di channel manager consentono di sincronizzare i calendari di decine di OTA. I partner di Driope ne hanno accesso per visualizzare il calendario delle prenotazioni e le statistiche sull’andamento della messa del reddito delle loro proprietà. #vacationrentals, #corporatehousing, # shorttermrentals

Name: AVO
Company description: AVO is the 1st platform offering 'Business Fit' Living, Meeting and Working spaces for the modern Business Traveler. - Discover and book excellent Venues and Spaces, Work Anywhere, Travel with maximum efficiency, ease, comfort and results!  - Monetize your space up to the last minute with the expanding Global Business Community! - Place smart ads and enjoy high conversion rates from the well-targeted and loyal customers! Our Vision: to become the global leader in ‘Business Fit’ rentals and venue management. We are disrupting the Business Travel world by building a single smart platform, that helps you flawlessly search, discover and book a variety of living, working and meeting spaces.  We aim to become ‘the LinkedIn of Travel Rentals"!  Services: The Travel Business & Venue Management / Rental industries are currently very fragmented. The private accommodation providers (apartments, houses & homes) as well as the Venue Management companies are not offering the best service possible and acutely need modernization.  AVO brings more value into the corporate traveller’s work experience and lives by making a wider range of services faster and more reliable. We will have more relevant filters, information and features such as: floor plans, area sizes, overview video clips, hourly rents, quality of life, professional/employment indexes and interactive maps, bio/eco friendliness to help and incentivize people to use our platform & services on a regular basis.  The advantageous packages and extra services offered by our partners: catering, transportation, customer care, concierge services, key storage, digital locks, modern tech devices will give us a competitive edge.  A rewarding Loyalty Points Program will keep the customers motivated and active.

Name: Lifestyle Suites Rome
Technologies: Cura, WhatsApp Business Chat, Cookie Script, Google Font API, Twitter Emoji (Twemoji), Apache, PWA, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Yoast SEO, Font Awesome, reCAPTCHA, jQuery, Facebook, WordPress, Apache HTTP Server, Aruba.it, Swiper, Open Graph, Facebook Pixel, Snowplow, MySQL, CookieScript, Google Maps, Slick, jQuery Migrate, Nginx, WhatsApp Business, YouTube, Google Fonts API, PHP, Twemoji
Company description: The Lifestyle Suites Rome is a 5-star boutique hotel located in the heart of Rome, exactly in Navona Square. It rises in a majestic and ancient noble palace that dates back to 1440 A.D. with a stunning view of Bernini’s Fountain of the Four Rivers and Borromini’s Church of St. Agnes in Agony. The hotel consists of 13 different luxury suites, each one custom designed with a unique theme, décor, and distinct features. They are the perfect combination of historical charm, comfort, and luxury of the most modern technologies you’d come to expect from top rated hotels today. Our luxurious and exclusive terrace on the top floor is the perfect setting for either a relaxing breakfast to start the day or a romantic “aperitivo” at sunset, with a breathtaking and unparalleled view of the Four Rivers Fountain and the Church of St. Agnes. The 24-hour desk and concierge are always ready to help all guests; from recommending the best restaurants to assisting in tours reservations, car services, airport transfers, museums tickets, and any other personalized request.  Among our services, there is also the possibility to arrange in-suite massages and other beauty treatments.  The Lifestyle Gym is at our guests’ disposal, giving them the chance to work out or unload muscular stress after long intercontinental flights with the latest and most technologically-advanced fitness equipment from Technogym.  Make sure not to miss our brand-new rooftop bar, serving fine wines and cocktails as well as a selection of Italian & continental finger-food & snacks. The bar services the breathtaking rooftop terrace as well as an indoor space, both of which can also be used for private & exclusive invite-only events.  Having been in the top-rated list of hotels both on TripAdvisor and Booking.com since our opening while maintaining a 4.5+-star rating on Google, we restlessly strive to always meet our guests’ satisfaction in everything we do.

Company description: Eco Urban B&B Florence awaits you on the 1st floor of a historic Florentine building, but don't let the facade deceive you... on the inside you’ll find 6 brand new rooms filled with ecoconscious style and comfort, plus an exclusive outdoor space where you can relax and just get away from all the hustle and bustle of the city. Everyday you will be able to enjoy our bio breakfast buffet, catering to all our guests’ needs: a fresh mix of the classic and the unusual, with organic, gluten-free, vegetarian & vegan options among others. Eco Urban B&B is more than a simple bed&breakfast! All our guests have access to the services of our partner hotel, located a stone's throw away: reception h24, concierge, luggage deposit. Eco Urban B&B introduces a new take on the classic concept of an urban retreat. Just close the door behind to find yourself protected from the chaos of the city, surrounded by all the luxury made in Italy inspired by nature. Thanks to the wooden furniture and accessories you can almost feel the rooms breathe, which makes for a perfect environment if you just want to relax. Speaking of environment, since we think it's an important responsibility for everyone to protect it, we want to set an example and send a clear message that we care. Therefore, we made it a main theme of our B&B, using organic and recycled materials throughout the place. Make sure to take advantage of our exclusive rates, available only on this website. Just browse the dates and use your email to unlock them!

Company description: The upscale Peterc Vineyard Estate, overlooking a 200 year-old vineyard plot, lies perched atop Brda wine country, where the Mediterranean meets the Alps. The area offers the best of both worlds in an endless array of exciting things to do, including dining at the finest gourmet restaurants or authentic local osterias, touring local award–winning wineries, indulging in outdoor activities in the region’s breathtaking scenery and exploring its amazing history. Our exclusive establishment welcomes guests age 16 and over. Easily accessible at just 30min from Trieste airport or a short 90 minutes from Venice Marco Polo, Treviso and Ljubljana airports. The Peterc Vineyard Estate offers a selection of bright and elegant accommodations situated in a peaceful and authentic setting. Our vineyard estate in the Brda hills is designed for the adult traveler seeking a tranquil, relaxing and indulgent atmosphere. With our carefully appointed rooms, luxury amenities, and beautiful views arching across the vineyards and olive groves all the way to the Adriatic Sea, you won’t find a more romantic place to stay in Brda than at the Peterc Vineyard Estate in Kojsko. At Peterc Vineyard Estate breakfast is a most important luxury, always included in the price of your stay and served till 12.00 o’clock. Choose from our delicious a la carte menu with complimentary sparkling wine. Guests can taste our exclusive selection of »Best of Brda« products from carefully sourced local suppliers, including freshly baked morning patisserie. A heavenly start to your day with a seasonal menu spoiling you with fresh, local and home-made delicacies. All our Experiences are tailor made to fit our guests’ requirements. Browse through our à la carte menu of suggestions and contact us to help you plan a unique experience customized to your interests and schedule (subject to availability and seasonality).  We offer: SLEEP WELLNESS, REMOTE WORKING, WINE CONCIERGE SERVICE Mail us: reservations@peterc-brda.si

Company description: Résidence BNB LTD, groupe immobilier depuis 30 ans se spécialise dans la conciergerie et l'asset management, pour vous proposer une gestion simplifiée et complète de votre bien. Depuis 2017, nous gérons plus de 150 biens dans toute la France de la French riviera aux côtes Bretonnes. Company description: Marina di Scarlino is a world-class marina resort perfectly located in the Italian Tuscan Maremma region, overlooking Elba Island and the Tuscan Archipelago. Our waterfront complex caters to the sailing and boat crew community, serves as the perfect getaway for those who are looking for a relaxing destination, and provides facilities and services for conference/exhibition events for professionals. We are also the main hub for travel around Tuscany—Florence, Pisa, Siena, and Rome are about a two-hour drive away. La Marina is one of the Mediterranean’s quietest and secluded natural harbors, with an ideal climate due to its setting next to the gulf and the surrounding hillside. We offer 960 berths, 2 main docks, and 7 floating docks with fingers, all with 24/7security. Marina di Scarlino is one of the best racing venues in the world, hosting the most prestigious races, including the TP52 Super Series, Melges 20 and 32, J/70, Dragon, Swan One Design, Nations Trophy 2021, and national rallies, like Sparkman & Stephens and Riva International. And on top of that, our guests can benefit from premium quality support services in our boatyard Nautor's Swan Global Service. Luxury resort-style accommodations are available at our Marina di Scarlino Resort, with 28 seafront apartments facing the marina, perfectly framed by the Archipelago and strategically positioned to offer stunning views of the gulf. In addition to an upgraded lifestyle experience in the shopping promenade, with designer boutiques, restaurants, cafés, art galleries, beauty center, pool, beach club, and events, our guests can either enjoy a wide list of water activities or explore the Maremma region with our concierge service that is ready to design an unforgettable itinerary per their needs. Real Estate: a luxury residential complex with 36 specially designed apartments, panoramic windows, and breathtaking views of the Tyrrhenian Sea is expected to debut by July 2024.

Company description: “El anfitrión perfecto piensa en todo” En 2017 Beatriz Pino y Diana Núñez deciden aventurarse en el fascinante mundo del alquiler vacacional.  Amigas desde la universidad, y después de haber viajado y vivido en numerosos países y haber trabajado en sectores como la comunicación y las finanzas, deciden dejar sus trabajos y emprender  para dedicarse a su pasión… Gracias a nuestra trayectoria y experiencia profesional, vimos una oportunidad de poder desarrollar nuestros conocimientos en un sector en pleno auge en España y con pocos profesionales que pudieran llevar a cabo la actividad.  Por esta razón nació KEYWii Home , porque no todo el mundo sabe cómo optimizar una propiedad enfocada en el alquiler  a corto plazo, sabe establecer la estrategia de precios óptima con la última tecnología en revenue management, la estrategia de marketing, comunicación y distribución necesaria para conseguir más reservas. Porque no todo el mundo tiene acceso al mejor personal de limpieza de tal manera que asegure las mejores valoraciones y estancias de los huéspedes, ni al mejor personal que realice la comunicación con el huésped 24/7 .  A medida que pasan los años, los propietarios cada vez son más conscientes de que a la hora de rentabilizar sus activos inmobiliarios a través del alquiler vacacional, la competencia es mayor y las ventajas competitivas cada vez menos existente, siendo muy complicado conseguir la diferenciación en el mercado sin ayuda profesional.  Sabemos que “el mejor alquiler es aquel que se siente como un hogar y se gestiona como un hotel”. KEYWii Home nace del deseo de satisfacer  esta necesidad y de un don personal para destacar en logística y hospitalidad.

Company description: De sleutel tot zorgeloos verhuren. Je woning verhuren via Airbnb, maar geen tijd om de gasten te ontvangen? Geen zin in de schoonmaak of andere rompslomp? Landladies neemt je graag de lasten uit handen! Landladies zijn er om de lastige aspecten rondom de verhuur van je woning over te nemen. Wij verzorgen minimaal de sleuteloverdracht en een prettige ontvangst voor de gasten. We nemen de tijd en geven ze een uitgebreide rondleiding door uw woning en geven de gasten tips voor een onvergetelijke tijd in Amsterdam. Tevens zijn wij bereikbaar voor de gasten als het gaat om grote en kleine noodgevallen, maar ook om ze extra service te bieden. Wat wij eigenlijk doen is fungeren als een receptie of concierge in een luxe hotel. Zo hopen we dat de gasten een prettige tijd hebben in je woning, wat uiteindelijk weer resulteert in goede reviews en dus meer verhuur voor de volgende keren.

Name: Amedia Express Graz Airport
Company description: Auf einem rund 3700 m2 großen Grundstück, direkt am Flughafengelände, in der Flughafenstraße in Feldkirchen bei Graz entwickelte Amedia ein Amedia Express Hotel mit 89 Business Doppelzimmern auf 4 Etagen mit den gewohnten Amedia Standards, die alle Anforderungen des Businessgastes und Vielreisenden erfüllt. Der zeitgemäße Neubau überzeugt durch seine perfekte öffentliche Verkehrsanbindung. Lediglich 300m Fußweg trennen den Reisenden vom Grazer Flughafen. Ein Bahn- und S-Bahnhof befindet sich direkt vor dem Hotel, ebenso die Straßenbahnhaltestelle zur Grazer Altstadt.  Zusätzlich kann das neue Amedia Express Airport mit 26 Außenparkplätzen und 30 Tiefgaragenplätzen, für die Gäste punkten. Das Amedia Express Airport erfüllt somit die perfekten Voraussetzungen für einen PARK – SLEEP & FLY Aufenthalt. Neben der optimalen Verkehrsanbindung und der idealen Lage, überzeugt das neue Amedia Express Airport Hotel aber auch mit einzigartiger Gestaltung, denn auch in diesem Hotel spielen Design & Lifestyle eine wesentliche Rolle.  Das Amedia Express Airport Hotel ist ein Businesshotel mit allen „Must-Haves“ und mehr, denn AMEDIA kombiniert besten Service mit neuester Technologie! Mit dem Konzept FREE MEDIA wird den Gästen Zugang zu den wichtigsten Medien der heutigen Zeit geboten.  Screen Mirroring (das Wiedergeben des eigenen Content auf dem Hotel-TV) kostenfreie Telefonie in 24 Länder  kostenfreies Highspeed-W-LAN digitale Gästemappe self Check-in und Check-out   und das Ganze völlig kostenlos.  Weiters gibt es in jedem Zimmer eine Alexa – Spracherkennung, die Ihnen auf Wunsch zur Verfügung steht. Derzeit wird noch an einem digitalen City Guide gearbeitet, der Ihnen die besten Restaurants, Sehenswürdigkeiten und weitere Besonderheiten in der Nähe des Hotels vorschlagen wird. Sozusagen ein digitaler Concierge Service.

Infatti essere Concierge significa professionalità, capacità di comunicare, e in lingue anche diverse dalla propria, sensibilità e conoscenza profonda della psicologia dell’Ospite anticipando, laddove è possibile, i suoi “desideri e necessità”.   Dai tempi remoti a tuttoggi un gruppo di persone, operoso, solidale e disponibile, ha sancito un nuovo modo di relazionarsi attraverso il vincolo associativo, infatti da comuni associati abbiamo scoperto di poterci aiutare e migliorarci in quanto colleghi arrivando a scoprirci amici, dove questa parola unisce e perfeziona l’animo e lo spirito. Aver realizzato questo ideale ci rende fieri di appartenere alle Chiavi d’Oro!

Name: Productionhotel.com
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Copenhagen, 10 Hauser Plads, 1127
Technologies: PHP, MySQL, Google Font API, Google Analytics, WordPress, Lightbox
Company description: Productionhotel is a travel company that provides services to the production industry. Common for all production companies is the need for hotel rooms on a irregular basis, one year you might have none - other years maybe 200, depending on the amount of activities that specific year. Hotels will often have a hard time giving a consistent low price on that basis.  Productionhotel collects the room nights from all companies to even out the difference in room night production from year to year. This way production companies will gain the volume benefits from each other and get a consistent low price yearly.  Productionhotel will not make hotel agreement with all hotels, as the price and advantages will level out as the number of hotels increase. Productionhotel have selected hotels that are preferred by production companies and has a proven track record.  Furthermore Productionhotel will focus on the following criteria’s for choosing hotels: •	Price & conditions (Minimum block-out dates, late CXL policies) •	Quality (best hotels within category; 5/4/3 star and apartment hotels) •	Logistic position (convenience to; city center, parking, infrastructure) •	Easy and flexible booking Besides giving production companies the free value of the above we offer services for a booking fee including:  -	Concierge services such as; airport pickup and drop of service, restaurant booking, car rental, sightseeing, welcome package in rooms and much more – your wish is our command!

Company description: Mallorca Label will give you unrivalled access to Mallorca’s hidden treasures. That doesn’t just mean  recommending the best restaurants, clubs and shops – it means booking you the most exotic tables, opening the red rope into coveted VIP rooms and granting your every wish and whim. You will be offered a selection of the island’s most outstanding hotels, whether you need a chic city boudoir, a rural retreat, a stunning sea view or an architectural gem. A butler service and private chef will complement your hotel’s lavish amenities and the beauty of the landscape around you. Mallorca Label sets the highest standards when judging accommodation and each hotel must meet three strict criteria: a unique setting, exquisite gastronomy and impeccable service.  For pure indulgence, delight your body and mind with new sensations at Mallorca’s divine spas. If it’s shopping you have in mind, you will be guided to the finest boutiques with personal shopping services to rival those of Milan or New York. And when the sun sets on Palma Bay, Mallorca Label will open your eyes to the capital’s hottest nightspots. Bringing you the very best the island has to offer, this bespoke private concierge service offers the elite traveler ‘members’ only’ privileges, letting you make the most of a Mediterranean paradise. Dealing directly with the owners and managers of the Balearics’ most prized establishments, Mallorca Label is on call 24/7 to make your trip one to remember.

Company description: L'easeaway for corporate clients                                Property Management - Home Caretaking - Guest Facilities L'easeaway offers a wide range of supporting services in apartments for short stay. Our services are ideal for realtors, property managers and for companies that offer temporary housing to expats. L'easeaway offers the following services:   Key Transfer One of our experienced and professional hosts welcomes your tenants and gives a complete tour of the apartment. The host provides the tenants with information about the neighborhood and answers their questions.   Concierge and Guest Facilities During the stay of your tenants, L'easeaway can be their 24/7 contact. Tenants can contact L'easeaway if keys are lost, the heating is not working, there is no Internet connection, or in case they have any questions. In addition to this, tenants can buy additional services such as a stocked fridge upon arrival, museum tickets, restaurant reservations, golf packages, transportation to and from Schiphol.   Cleaning When the tenants have checked out, L'easeaway thoroughly cleans the apartment, and replaces linen and towels.   Bed linen and towels L'easeaway offers the renting and cleaning of hotel quality linen and towels. A wide range of packages is available upon your request and specific needs.   Toiletries Extra comfort for your tenants? L'easeaway offers an assortment of high quality vanity kits, slippers and bathrobes.   Cleaning rented apartments L'easeaway can arrange the cleaning of your rented apartments.   Home Caretaking L'easeaway reduces the risk of burglary of your vacant apartments. We have different methods to create an inhabited impression.   Customized L'easeaway offers customized services for all her clients. In consultation we can provide additional, or more specific services. L'easeaway can work fully independent, on a flexible base, and doesn’t require long-term contracts

Company description: Domaine des Officiers is een exclusieve privé accommodatie in de Belgische Ardennen. De locatie is geschikt voor uiteenlopende speciale familiegelegenheden en zakelijke evenementen. Domaine des Officiers was het oude officieren huis voor de hoogste officieren van de fameuze Chasseurs Ardennais.  Een onderdeel van het Belgische leger welke oorspronkelijk werd ingezet om de grenzen te bewaken in de omgeving van Vielsalm. De Chasseurs Ardennais bestonden voornamelijk uit lokale inwoners en hebben het  everzwijn als symbool. Het everzwijn heeft dan ook tot 1990 op het Domaine des Officiers gewoond. De gebouwen waren de trots van het regiment.  Het was een plek om te genieten en te ontspannen.    Mess des Officiers De hoofdvilla heeft 10 slaapkamers en biedt accommodatie voor 24 personen. Alle kamers hebben een eigen badkamer. In de villa is een ruime woonkamer met open haard, surround system, de ‘Bar des Officiers’,  aparte eetkamer, tv-kamer/ vide en een volledig uitgeruste keuken.   Spa des Officiers De spa is recentelijk gebouwd onder de villa. Spa des Officiers bestaat uit een 10-persoons whirlpool,  sauna, massageruimte, ontspanningsruimte, regendouche en een koude waterval.   L'Ecuries des Officiers L'Ecuries werd vroeger gebruikt als stal, maar het gebouw met dubbele verdieping is omgebouwd tot twee multifunctionele zalen. L'Ecuries heeft ook twee nieuw gebouwde slaapkamers en biedt accommodatie voor vier personen. De ruimten kunnen worden gebruikt voor verschillende doeleinden, zakelijke of privé. Bijvoorbeeld: geschikt als yoga, fitnessruimte,  seminar/ vergaderruimte en eetkamer. La Conciergerie des Officiers Het poorthuis werd vroeger gebruikt door de onderofficieren.  Twaalf prachtige net gerenoveerde kamers met eigen badkamers.  Jardin des Officiers Het complex beschikt over een grote binnenplaats en ruime tuin met een vuurplaats en een tennisbaan.

Company description: La prima web app che permette di gestire completamente da remoto i soggiorni in hotel o gli affitti brevi, dall’apertura dei portoni, all’accesso dell’impresa delle pulizie alla fine del soggiorno, passando per check-in, check-out e controllo dei consumi dell’appartamento.  Inoltre, sarà possibile replicare la tipica ospitalità italiana grazie a una reception virtuale altamente personalizzabile. L’ingresso avviene tramite la app o digitando un codice sull’apposito tastierino, in modo da rendere l’accesso possibile anche in assenza di wifi o nel caso in cui l’ospite abbia il telefono scarico o non disponibile.  La app dialoga con tutti i principali portali online per la prenotazione: una volta selezionate le date, l’ospite riceverà una mail con il link alla web app e un codice di accesso, valido esclusivamente nei giorni del soggiorno. Il sistema Ok Home è in grado di gestire in automatico il check-in e tutte le operazioni burocratiche annesse, dal riconoscimento degli ospiti, fino al calcolo della tassa di soggiorno. L’unico a fornire ai guest un vero e proprio concierge online, disponibile h24: l’host può infatti sfruttare la piattaforma per inserire numeri di emergenza, informazioni utili (come la mappa dell’appartamento, il funzionamento della macchina per il caffè e della lavatrice, come aprire il divano letto), ma anche esclusivi consigli di viaggio. Un carnet di benvenuto sempre a portata di smartphone. Ingressi e uscite sono monitorati dal tastierino. Anche l’accesso dell’impresa di pulizie è gestito in automatico, grazie a semplici notifiche mail e codici continuativi.  Il sistema permette inoltre di creare codici singoli per gestire eventuali interventi di manutenzione o emergenze. Non solo...avrete la possibilità di controllare i consumi da remoto, permettendo di regolare luce, riscaldamento, aria condizionata ed elettrodomestici.  Gestire i tuoi appartamenti, B&B e Hotel non è mai stato così facile. OK HOME: Ospitare in Digitale!

Company description: Located in the heart of Athens, Wyndham Grand Athens is a premier destination for both business and leisure travelers. Our hotel offers 276 rooms and suites, each designed with modern elegance and featuring stunning views of Athens, the Acropolis, or Lycabettus Hill.  Guests can enjoy unparalleled comfort with amenities like hypoallergenic bedding, pillow selections, and luxurious bath products. Our commitment to exceptional service includes 24-hour reception and concierge, express check-in, and complimentary super-speed Wi-Fi. Our dining options cater to every taste and occasion. Start your day with a breathtaking view and a delicious breakfast at "Above," our rooftop restaurant, or savor Mediterranean cuisine throughout the day at "FOS." For a more casual setting, "Silk" lounge bar offers light snacks, coffee, and drinks in a relaxed environment. The rooftop pool bar, with its panoramic views, provides the perfect backdrop for signature cocktails and light lunches, making every meal a memorable experience. Wyndham Grand Athens is also an ideal venue for meetings and events, boasting 2,500 square meters of versatile space that can accommodate up to 2,000 guests. Our state-of-the-art facilities and professional planning services ensure successful conferences, weddings, and social events. After a busy day, unwind at our fully equipped gym, sauna, or spa, where you can rejuvenate with treatments using natural ingredients from the Aegean Sea. Discover affordable luxury and impeccable service at Wyndham Grand Athens, where every stay is unforgettable.

Name: Grand'Hotel Resort Ma&Ma
Company description: The Ma&Ma (Grand Hotel Resort) has overcome a noteworthy challenge in building an extra luxury resort with a low impact on the surrounding environment. The magnificent elegance and functionality are conveyed in a stylish aesthetic design which coexists with the more rigorous green style. The leitmotif is a strong personality style which matches with the surrounding natural environment: curve and enveloping lines, glamour appeal, minimalistic architectural design and fine materials. The hotel boasts a natural inclination to the excellence which make the guest feel like the main character of the scene and at the same time highlights and magnifies the benefits of the natural elements. Ma&Ma Grand Hotel Resort is based on distinguished services capacity, sober and refined elegance, care to provide comfort, privacy, and regeneration. Ma&Ma Grand Hotel Resort offers guests a range of super-efficient practical services such as: Restaurant Fashion Boutique Lounge Bar 24hr Reception Concierge Meeting rooms Undercover parking and Security Valet parking service Gym (Fitness Centre) Full porter service Free Wi-Fi internet access Outdoor Swimming Pool Spa/ Beauty Centre free access Ma&Ma offers a choice of 92 chic rooms including 33 Comfort Room, 46 Deluxe Room, 6 Family Room e 7 Suite. Ma&Ma also offer 15 family room outside the Grand'Hotel

Name: Prague City Apartments
HQ Location: Czech Republic, Praha, Prague, 4 Karoliny Svetle
Technologies: J2EE, Google, Pinterest, Linkedin, Google Font API, Google Hosted Libraries, Google Tag Manager, jQuery Validation Plugin, Materialize CSS, Google Analytics, jQuery, Element UI, Font Awesome, LiveChat, Java, Google Conversion Tracking, ShareThis, Google AdSense, TouchSwipe, Material Design Lite, OpenGSE, Google Plus, Blogger, Microsoft 365, Python, Bootstrap, Google Fonts API, Mobirise, Google Maps, YouTube, Jetty, Animate.Css
Company description: Naše společnost Prague City Apartments má v oblasti pronájmu servisovaných apartmánů již dlouholetou tradici - vznikla už v roce 1993. V současnosti spravujeme 72 moderních, kompletně zařízených apartmánů, které se nacházejí přímo v centru Prahy. Naši klientelu tvoří převážně hosté, kteří zde pobývají dlouhodobě, ale samozřejmě poskytujeme také krátkodobé i střednědobé pronájmy.  Našim klientům jsme k dispozici 24 hodin denně, a to na jedné ze dvou recepcí, která sídlí přímo naproti Národnímu Divadlu. Zde se nachází i veškeré zázemí a kanceláře společnosti. Druhá recepce, která je v blízkosti Pařížské ulice, poskytuje klientům servis 12 hodin denně. Součástí našeho kompletního servisu jsou služby housekeepingu, technického oddělení a concierge. V Prague City Apartments se staráme nejen o pohodlí klientů, ale také našich zaměstnanců. Pravidlně organizujeme teambuildingy do Čech i do zahraničí a zaměstnanci mají možnost využívat výhody Multisport karty a jazykových kurzů. Pracovníci oddělení Guest Services, kteří jsou denně v osobním kontaktu s našimi klienty, mají také k dispozici přípěvek na oblečení. Naše apartmány si mohou zaměstnanci dokonce několikrát do roka "půjčit" pro sebe, nebo své blízké. S našimi kolegy si také zpestřujeme pracovní čas například každo-pátečními tématickými dny a nebo naší tzv. "Mood board", kde si označujeme naši aktuální náladu. Tohle všechno tvoří ten největší benefit práce u nás - velmi zábavný, uvolněný a přátelský kolektiv.  O tom, jak to u nás doopravdy chodí, se můžete přesvědčit v tomto videu: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YxbF5T-Ez3g Pokud Vás naše firma zaujme a už se vidíte v našem PCA kolektivu, neváhejte nás kontaktovat - práce je tu dost a neustále hledáme někoho zajímavého do našeho týmu!  Ozvat se nám můžete na PRACE@PRAGUE-CITY-APARTMENTS.CZ a nezapomeňte přiložit tvoje CV s fotografií a pár řádků o Vás - PROČ zrovna VY byste měl patřit do našeho týmu?  Těšíme se na Vás! :)

Company description: Personal Doctor è un servizio di assistenza medica personalizzata che rivede in modo moderno, tecnologico e strutturato, il ruolo del Medico personale di fiducia, garantendo il massimo della soddisfazione da parte dei propri Clienti in termini di attenzione e qualità del servizio. Ecco cosa forniamo ai nostri Clienti: •	un medico PERSONALE specialista, estremamente qualificato, sempre disponibile al telefono, oppure in persona nel nostro ambulatorio in centro a Milano, oppure online, che fa da punto di riferimento del Cliente per tutti i bisogni di salute •	programmi di prevenzione avanzata tarati sulla persona, oltre quanto sarebbe ottenibile con l’SSN o con una assicurazione privata,  •	una segretaria medica personale (Health Concierge) per i bisogni organizzativi, logistici ed i rapporti con le assicurazioni quali rimborsi etc,  •	un Comitato Tecnico di indirizzamento verso le migliori cure/specialisti in caso di bisogni di salute particolari che non possono essere gestiti in autonomia dal Medico Personale •	il collegamento dei dispositivi indossabili del Cliente (smart watch, anelli elettronici, bracciali, etc) alla cartella elettronica per tenere monitorato lo stato di benessere del Cliente. E’ la medicina come può essere nel 2025, per clientela esigente ed impegnata. Il servizio è attivo nella città di Milano, e funziona tramite membership annuale. Per conoscere le offerte  per te, per la tua azienda e i tuoi familiari scrivici a info@personaldoctor.it

Name: Dental Center Fabris
Technologies: Ai, WordPress, Facebook Pixel, Outlook, Centro
Company description: More than 35 years of experience . More than 15 000 implanted implants. More than 3500 perfect smiles. Driven by passion towards both work and art in an ideal mixture of tradition, experience and a fresh outlook on the world, at the Fabris Center we create a unique concept of dentistry and aesthetics in the service of health, beauty and the quality of living. Excellent service, luxurious special benefits and affordable prices go hand in hand at our center and we guarantee our patients an individualised approach and a pleasant and painless treatment experience. At the Fabris Dental Center we feel that dental therapy should be an upgrade to your lifestyle and not a deprivation of pleasure.  That is why many additional benefits like a luxurious interior, concierge services and many other exclusive benefits of our partner wellness centers  await. Dental therapy and aesthetics are an improvement, not a deprivation of your lifestyle. Is there a better place to spend your vacation then Croatia, «the land of a thousand islands», known for incredible natural beauties, charming hosts as well as for food and vines that excite even the biggest hedonists? Thanks to the extremely favourable position, the Istria and Kvarner region attracts tourists from all over Europe for almost 180 years and offers them all the benefits of the authentic Mediterranean at the palm of their hand. In such an environment, we at the Fabris Center have been building our successful dental tourism story for more than 35 years creating over 3500 perfect smiles in our dental offices because of it.

Name: Stockholms Medicus
Company description: Vi är Stockholms mest centrala plastikkirurgmottagning med Sveriges bredaste sortiment av livsförbättrande behandlingar och ingrepp.  Hos oss möts du av stora, vackra och välkomnande miljöer, med de senaste behandlingsmetoderna och de senaste behandlingsteknikerna både inom kosmetisk plastikkirurgi och kosmetiska klinikbehandlingar. Tillgänglig och erfaren personal tar hand om dig vid ditt besök och borgar för ett exakt och precist resultat. Vår strävan är att erbjuda så effektiva behandlingar som möjligt, med så kort återhämtningstid som möjligt och till så vettigt pris som möjligt. Via vår concierge får du ekonomiska muskler att förverkliga din investering i dig själv -  hos oss får du en räntefri krediter om du önskar. Verksamheten arbetar med tillstånd av Socialstyrelsen och du hittar oss granne med Mood - livsstilsgallerian i hjärtat av Stockholm. Välkommen in på vår hemsida www.stomed.se och läs mer om våra olika behandlingar - och ingrepp, ta del av våra före- och efterbilder och håll dig uppdaterad via våra flöden på bloggen, Facebook och Instagram.

Multi-Family Office Services: Fincasa Capital's multi-family office services cater to the complex financial and lifestyle needs of affluent families. Our dedicated team of specialists provides various services, including wealth management, estate planning, tax advisory, and concierge services. We work closely with our clients to understand their unique needs and objectives, delivering customized solutions that ensure the preservation and growth of their wealth across generations. Company Formation: At Fincasa Capital, we understand the complexities and challenges of establishing a new business. Our expert team guides clients through the entire company formation process, from choosing the proper business structure and jurisdiction to managing registration, licensing, and compliance requirements. Passport and Citizenship Services: We recognize the value of global mobility for individuals and their families. Fincasa Capital offers comprehensive passport and citizenship services, assisting clients in securing residency, citizenship, and second passports through investment programs in various countries. Our team of experienced professionals navigates the legal and regulatory landscape, providing personalized guidance to help clients make informed decisions and successfully complete the application process. At Fincasa Capital, we pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence, integrity, and confidentiality.

Name: CFN Generale Fiduciaria S.p.A.
Technologies: Disclosure, Google Font API, Google Fonts API, Nginx
Company description: Generale Fiduciaria S.p.A, costituita nel 2006 da Andrea Tavecchio si è accreditata nel tempo come una boutique altamente professionale, rafforzatasi poi con l’ingresso nella compagine sociale, nel 2016, del Gruppo MutuiOnline.  Compagnia Fiduciaria Nazionale S.p.A. è stata costituita nel 1925 ed è la fiduciaria italiana con più tradizione, con un nucleo di Soci che fanno riferimento da diversi decenni alle famiglie Aldrighetti, Falk e Pesenti. Nel corso del 2022 Compagnia Fiduciaria Nazionale S.p.A., ha deciso di unire le forze con Generale Fiduciaria S.p.A., per creare una realtà indipendente, tecnologica, non di derivazione bancaria, dando vita a CFN Generale Fiduciaria S.p.A., società fiduciaria indipendente, con una massa amministrata di oltre 3,5 miliardi di Euro e sottoposta alla vigilanza di Banca d’Italia.  Grazie alle nostre competenze professionali, siamo in grado di cogliere tempestivamente le opportunità di mercato e trasformarle in servizi tecnologicamente avanzati e capaci di adattarsi alle esigenze della clientela. La Società è dotata di una piattaforma tecnologica di proprietà, che consente di acquisire e aggregare flussi di dati eterogenei, di normalizzarli e renderli fruibili per molteplici servizi. La tecnologia consente, inoltre, la digitalizzazione di tutti i dati e documenti provenienti da fonti esterne e l’automazione del data-entry; grazie a questo siamo in grado di aumentare la produttività e migliorare significativamente la qualità degli output, la generazione di reportistiche evolute e interfacce web-based che consentono alla nostra realtà di essere riconosciuta come leader tecnologico nel mercato di riferimento. I servizi offerti da Generale Fiduciaria S.p.A. sono: -	Amministrazione fiduciaria con o senza intestazione; -	Escrow agent e mandati irrevocabili; -	Servizi contabili e amministrativi per holding, trust e società immobiliari; -	Servizi amministrativi per family office; -	Servizi di conciergerie.

Company description: Limpiezas herencia es una compañía perteneciente a Herencia Grupo, que tiene como objetivo ser el proveedor global de servicios generales para la empresa. Nuestra historia empieza en el año 1976, con una empresa de servicios de limpieza de oficinas y locales en Madrid. A partir de este momento, y en principio de forma local, siendo el mercado de actuación el Corredor del Henares, comienza a desarrollar su actividad de limpieza de oficinas desde una vertiente empresarial, basada en criterios de calidad y de servicio para el cliente. Posteriormente, la compañía evoluciona en su mercado, prestando servicios de limpieza a oficinas, edificios y locales en toda la Comunidad de Madrid, y trabajando con empresas de rango alto, que requieren una gestión completa de sus servicios, no solo de limpieza de sus oficinas o despachos, si no también de conserjería, jardinería, electricidad, reformas, etc. En la actualidad nuestro grupo esta formado por más de 80 personas, que constituyen el verdadero activo de la empresa, siendo uno de sus principales pilares. La política de Recursos Humanos ha sido el eje fundamental para el desarrollo de nuestro Grupo. Otro de los elementos importantes es la utilización de tecnología puntera en todos nuestros servicios ya se trate de limpieza de oficinas, mantenimiento de jardines o reformas de edificios y locales en Madrid, entre otros, lo que unido a nuestra experiencia, forman los cimientos que hacen de nuestro Grupo, una empresa sólida en su sector. Nuestra estrategia de futuro, se basa en convertir al Grupo Herencia, en el proveedor global de servicios generales para sus clientes, asumiendo la externalización de estas actividades por parte de las empresas, con el objetivo de conseguir un menor coste, mayor calidad y profesionalidad en su ejecución.

Name: MobieleHuismeester.nl
Technologies: WordPress
Company description: De MobieleHuismeester.nl is een vernieuwend initiatief dat is ontstaan vanuit onze ervaringen en passie binnen de vastgoedsector. Traditie. Een huismeester was ooit een man met aanzien. Hij woonde nabij en wist wat er speelde in ‘zijn’ gebouw. Gestuwd door de modernisering en flexibilisering is de rol van de huismeester in de 21ste eeuw langzaam verdrongen. Een nieuw jasje. Vanuit onze ervaring ontdekten wij echter dat er nog steeds behoefte is aan persoonlijke aandacht op locatie, uw vastgoed. Veelal heeft u een beheerder welke de (dagelijkse-) calamiteiten voor u afhandelt, echter wordt dit vanaf kantoor geregeld hetgeen soms tot misverstanden kan leiden. Aanleiding voor ons om het concept ‘huismeester’ een nieuw jasje te geven. Vertrouwde schakel. Door het aanbod van onze diensten fungeren wij als schakel tussen uw vastgoed, de beheerder en de gebruiker waarbij wij er vanzelfsprekend voor zorgen dat de belangen van alle partijen niet in het gedrang komen. Onze huismeester ziet, signaleert en ondersteunt waar noodzakelijk. ‘Onze huismeester is dé Conciërge voor Uw vastgoed’

Company description: Binnema Groep is uw betrouwbare partner voor het moeiteloos onderhouden van uw vastgoed. Wij nemen de zorg voor vastgoedonderhoud volledig uit handen, zodat u zich kunt richten op uw corebusiness. Of u nu een vastgoedbeheerder, woningbouwcorporatie, overheidsinstantie, VVE of ondernemer bent, wij staan klaar om u te ondersteunen. Onze beloftes: - Wij streven naar ongeëvenaarde kwaliteit. -Ons team staat 24/7 paraat, 365 dagen per jaar. - Wij zijn flexibel en onze medewerkers pro-actief. -Wij hechten waarde aan duurzame langetermijnrelaties Schoonmaak Wij zijn meesters in het reinigen van allerhande panden, variërend van kantoren en appartementencomplexen tot kleine openbare ruimtes en winkelcentra. Of het nu gaat om incidentele klussen of periodiek onderhoud, wij staan voor u klaar. Vastgoedonderhoud Wij zijn uw betrouwbare partner voor dagelijks onderhoud, mutatieonderhoud en grootschalige vastgoedprojecten. Onze storingsdienst is 24/7 beschikbaar, 7 dagen per week, om snel en efficiënt te reageren op uw behoeften. Glas- en gevelonderhoud Binnema Groep is de specialist in glas- en gevelonderhoud. Naast het verzorgen van glasbewassing doen wij ook specialistisch gevelonderhoud en renovatie van glas. Onze huismeesters zijn multifunctionele facilitaire experts, fungerend als de schakel tussen u en de gebruikers van uw pand. Ze voeren diverse facilitaire taken uit, inclusief klein onderhoud en diensten als conciërge, en zorgen voor een optimaal functionerende omgeving. Kortom, Binnema Groep is er om u te ontzorgen, uw vastgoed te optimaliseren en duurzame relaties op te bouwen. Neem vandaag nog contact met ons op en ontdek hoe wij uw vastgoedbehoeften kunnen vervullen. #Vastgoedbeheer #Vastgoedonderhoud #Partnership

Company description: Creamos entornos seguros y saludables para hacer más fácil la vida de nuestros clientes. Con más de 20 años de trayectoria, en Grupo Ocean ofrecemos soluciones integrales de servicios con cobertura nacional. Nuestro compromiso es claro: mejorar la vida de las personas a través del cuidado, la eficiencia y la excelencia en la gestión de los espacios que habitan, trabajan o disfrutan. 👉 Nuestros principales servicios: 🧼 Limpieza técnica para comunidades, oficinas, industrias y espacios públicos, con especialización en sectores como el agroalimentario, farmacéutico, deportivo, educativo, sanitario y de grandes eventos. 👮 Conserjería y servicios auxiliares, con personal cualificado, trato profesional y enfoque en la seguridad, el control de accesos y la atención al cliente en entornos residenciales y corporativos. 🛠️ Mantenimiento técnico de instalaciones, preventivo y correctivo, adaptado a edificios de oficinas, comunidades, centros comerciales e instalaciones industriales. 🌱 Jardinería y paisajismo, con servicios de mantenimiento, diseño de zonas verdes, obras de jardinería, podas, control de plagas y asesoramiento técnico especializado. 🏊 Mantenimiento integral de piscinas y servicios de socorrismo y salvamento acuático, con personal formado, cumplimiento normativo y respuesta ante incidencias. 📦 Outsourcing logístico e industrial, ofreciendo personal y soluciones operativas para mejorar la productividad y la eficiencia en almacenes, plataformas logísticas e industrias de diferentes sectores. Con más de 2.500 clientes activos y presencia en toda España —operando en la zona norte como Clyma y en Aragón como Salgado Zaragoza— apostamos por la cercanía, la calidad, la sostenibilidad y el empleo estable. Nuestro equipo, formado por más de 2.000 profesionales de más de 30 nacionalidades, es nuestro mayor valor. ✅ Calidad, eficacia y cercanía ✅ Innovación y tecnología ✅ Compromiso con el empleo de calidad y la sostenibilidad

Name: Te Paske Facilitaire Dienstverlening
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Amstelveen, 102 D Heemraadschapslaan, 1181
Technologies: WordPress, MySQL, PHP, Ubuntu, Revslider, Google Font API
Company description: Wij bieden een breed scala diensten aan. Enkele voorbeelden van onze bedrijfsactiviteiten zijn: - Algemene schoonmaakwerkzaamheden  - Specialistische reiniging - Glasbewassing - Opleveringen en schoonmaakonderhoud van kantoorobjecten en woningen - Onderhoudswerkzaamheden voor diverse VvE's - Bewaking-, catering-, receptie-, conciërge/huismeesterdiensten - 'Alles-in-1' pakketten': 1 contactpersoon, 1 leverancier: dat scheelt tijd en geld! Te Paske is een familiebedrijf en dat is terug te zien in de platte organisatiestructuur, minimale bureaucratie/korte lijnen, zeer grote betrokkenheid, persoonlijke benadering, vaste contactpersonen en hoge servicegerichtheid. Voor de relatie met onze opdrachtgevers geldt: kwaliteit gaat voor kwantiteit. We richten ons op het opbouwen en behouden van langdurige klantrelaties. Iedere opdrachtgever is anders en daarom maken wij geen gebruik van een vast stramien voor werkprogramma’s en offertes. Wij stellen alles ‘persoonlijk en op maat’ samen en passen ons aan naar de wensen van onze opdrachtgevers. Met veel van onze opdrachtgevers werken we al langer dan 10, 15 of zelfs 25 jaar samen. Dankzij deze klantrelaties bestaan we al meer dan 30 jaar. Onze meerwaarde wordt pas echt duidelijk op momenten dat flexibiliteit wordt vereist en wij kunnen laten zien wat facilitaire dienstverlening inhoudt. Onze opdrachtgevers, onze medewerkers, kwaliteit en service staan centraal. Dienstverlening begint met heldere communicatie. Onze opdrachtgevers hebben geen organogrammen nodig om te begrijpen hoe we werken. Wij hechten veel belang aan het behoud van ons familiaire karakter en houden graag zelf het directe toezicht op alle objecten van onze opdrachtgevers. Hoe minder schakels, hoe minder ruis en des te efficiënter. Omdat onverwachte situaties zich dag en nacht kunnen voordoen, zijn we 24 uur per dag bereikbaar.

Name: M. Pro Services
Company description: Commercial Cleaning Services Cleaning 4 You provides customizable, scalable, and flexible commercial cleaning services. We offer one-time deep cleans or ongoing janitorial solutions for single and multi-unit spaces as well as entire commercial building cleaning. Our promise is to keep your commercial environment healthy, clean, and attractive. Our commercial cleaning services are focused on all areas of your business including elevators, stairwells, hallways, common areas, restrooms, parking, exterior grounds, work areas, and everything in between. Cleaning 4 You is fully bonded, licensed, and insured to provide you with professional janitorial services. Our team is reliable and we have the experience and expertise to deliver complete customer satisfaction. Services de nettoyage commerciaux  Cleaning 4 You fournit des services de nettoyage commercial personnalisables, évolutifs et flexibles.  Nous proposons des nettoyages en profondeur ponctuels ou des solutions de conciergerie continues pour les espaces à logements uniques et multiples ainsi que le nettoyage de l'ensemble des bâtiments commerciaux.  Notre promesse est de garder votre environnement commercial sain, propre et attrayant.  Nos services de nettoyage commercial se concentrent sur tous les domaines de votre entreprise, y compris les ascenseurs, les cages d'escalier, les couloirs, les espaces communs, les toilettes, le parking, les terrains extérieurs, les zones de travail et tout le reste.  Cleaning 4 You est entièrement cautionné, agréé et assuré pour vous fournir des services de conciergerie professionnels.  Notre équipe est fiable et nous avons l'expérience et l'expertise nécessaires pour offrir une entière satisfaction à nos clients.

Company description: The Consorzio Leonardo Servizi (today Consorzio Leonardo Servizi e Lavori - CLSL) was established on 5 August 2004 with the aim of aggregating the experience and professionalism of companies operating in the "soft" service sector (cleaning, porterage, concierge) in order to offer the market the global service activity to these referred. Since 2011, the Consortium has expanded its offer by virtue of the entry into the consortium of new companies belonging to the construction and maintenance sector. The primary purpose for which it was set up, therefore, is to grow its companies both from an economic and a technical point of view. In fact, the CLSL has a common business organization that coordinates the activities of the consortium members, promoting their development and rationalization; these activities (services, works and supplies) are entrusted and therefore carried out by the consortium members themselves without resorting to subcontracting and use. To improve coordination and control, the Consortium has obtained ISO 9001 certification in order to ensure maximum reliability and professionalism in the execution of the works, in the provision of services and supplies. Starting from February 2013, adapting to the regulations laid down by Legislative Decree 163/2006 art. 36 "stable consortia" and in accordance with the provisions of law 207/2010, has assumed the status of Consortium Stable, thus obtaining the SOA certification issued by SOA MEDITERRANEA Spa and since March 2018 it has become a Stable Consortium Cooperative, attesting with ESNA-SOA. The Consortium makes it possible to minimize the use of subcontracting thus offering services, works and supplies at costs that exclude additional percentages for "general contractor" and therefore refer entirely to the activity.

Company description: EIN GROSSER AUGENBLICK. EIN LEBEN LANG FREUDE. Wir überschreiten die Grenzen einer herkömmlichen Planungsagentur. Unsere Klientel sucht nicht nach dem Gewöhnlichen, sondern nach einer Hochzeit bzw. Event, die in ihrer Außergewöhnlichkeit unvergesslich bleibt. Unsere anspruchsvollen und stilbewussten Kunden setzen hohe Standards für die Gestaltung ihres großen Tages und ihrer exklusiven Feiern. Jede unserer Dienstleistungen wird maßgeschneidert, um ein Fest zu kreieren, das in Erinnerung bleibt - eine perfekte Verschmelzung von Planung und Kreativität. Julian Amenth Wedding & Events schöpft aus der Tiefe der Emotionen, um Ihren bedeutsamsten Tag so sorgenfrei und doch unvergleichlich schön zu gestalten. Wir sind die Verkörperung lebendig gewordener Träume, und das mit Leidenschaft und Hingabe. Als führende Pioniere der Hochzeitsplanung in Wien verkörpert Julian Amenth Wehrding & Events die Kunst der Inszenierung opulenter und glamouröser Feste. Wir sind renommierte Experten in der Eventgestaltung und setzen Maßstäbe für Hochzeitserlebnisse, die nicht nur verändern, sondern auch verzaubern. Unser herausragender Ruf gründet sich auf unserer einzigartigen Fähigkeit, Räume in atemberaubende Kulissen voller Design und Glanz zu verwandeln. Unsere Veranstaltungen übertreffen das Gewöhnliche; sie entwickeln sich zu spektakulären Ereignissen, die bleibende Eindrücke von Luxus und Eleganz hinterlassen. Unser Bestreben bei Julian Amenth Wedding & Events ist es, die erste Wahl für anspruchsvolle Kunden an ihrem außergewöhnlichen Tag zu sein. Spezialisiert auf luxuriöse Hochzeiten, exklusive Events und personalisierte Verlobungen, sorgt unser Team, einschließlich „Day of Coordinators", „Wedding & Event Stewards" und einem exklusiven „Braut Concierge", dafür, dass die Feierlichkeiten sowohl unvergesslich als auch makellos durchgeführt werden. Mit unserer Planungsexpertise von privaten und Firmen-Events und unserem gefeierten Ruf in Österreich sind wir einzigartig positioniert.

Name: De Reüniecommissie
Technologies: Google Font API, Google Tag Manager, reCAPTCHA, Google Analytics, PWA, Font Awesome, CookieYes, jQuery, OWL Carousel, HTTP/3, Open Graph, LiteSpeed, cdnjs, Laravel, PHP, Google Workspace, Google Fonts API
Company description: De Reüniecommissie heeft jarenlange ervaring in het perfect organiseren van reünies. Wij zijn het enige bedrijf in Europa dat volledig georganiseerde reünies aanbied waarbij een school volledig ontzorgt wordt. We vinden bijna iedere oud-leerling en regelen een memorabele dag. Daarnaast zorgen wij ervoor dat de vergunningen, catering en financiën geregeld worden. Met de Reüniecommissie loopt uw school geen enkel financieel risico. Onze kosten worden gedekt door de drankjes en een bijdrage voor het organiseren en het warme buffet. De enige 'kosten' voor uw school zijn het zorgen voor een conciërge en voldoende B.H.V.'ers gedurende de reünie. De Reüniecommissie heeft een unieke methode om zoveel mogelijk oud-leerlingen snel op te sporen en te bereiken. Via e-mail, Whatsapp, Schoolbank.nl, social media en uw eigen reünie website zorgen wij voor maximaal bereik. Het karakter van uw school bepaalt vanzelfsprekend hoe het feest eruit komt te zien. De Reüniecommissie volgt stap voor stap uw wensen, komt vanuit haar ervaring met slimme oplossingen en een solide uitvoering. Dit alles in nauw overleg met de contactpersonen binnen uw school. Oud-klasgenoten en schoolvrienden terugzien, herinneringen ophalen, weer lessen volgen bij die leraar natuurkunde, de geur van de gymzaal opsnuiven, disco in de aula: een reünie is voor iedereen onbetaalbaar. Daar doet de Reüniecommissie het voor. En met succes! Vraag gerust naar referenties van scholen die u voorgingen.

Company description: Escape Room 058 is de eerste Escape Room in Leeuwarden en het spannendste reallife ontsnappingsavontuur van dit moment. Door logica te combineren met out-of-the-box denken en onorthodoxe methodes, dienen jullie raadsels op te lossen, sloten te kraken en geheime informatie te decoderen. Escape Room 058 zorgt voor een intense, zenuwslopende ervaring waarbij tijd en realiteit vervagen en daarin schuilt juist het gevaar, immers; time is key! ◾ Terrorist Threat ◾ De AIVD houdt het hoofdkwartier van een terroristencel in de gaten. In alle haast verlaten de verdachten onverwachts het pand. Kort daarna wordt in een video gedreigd met bomaanslagen. Met grote urgentie worden jullie, een team van specialisten, gemobiliseerd om Nederland te redden. Een uur om de eerste bom te vinden én te ontmantelen… Tik-tak-tik-tak! 2-7 personen (aanbevolen 5-6) Tijdsduur: max. 60 minuten ◾ Room 313 ◾ Van enkele gasten die jullie voor gingen is nooit meer iets vernomen. Bij aankomst hangt er al een onheilspellende sfeer en de conciërge gedraagt zich hoogst eigenaardig… Weten jullie te achterhalen wat er met de verdwenen gasten gebeurd is en wel voordat het noodlot toeslaat? 2-6 personen (aanbevolen 4-5) Tijdsduur: max. 60 minuten ◾ The Cabin ◾ Officieel staat het pand al jaren leeg, maar het wemelt er van de zwervers en drugsverslaafden. Bovendien rijden er in het holst van de nacht bestelbusjes af en aan, wat is hier toch gaande… Nieuwsgierigheid wint van angst en jullie betreden het pand, vrijwel direct slaat de twijfel toe. Was dit wel zo’n goed idee? 2-6 personen (aanbevolen 4-5) Tijdsduur: max. 60 minuten

Company description: Exist è l’agenzia leader in Italia negli Eventi di Corporate Hospitality e nei servizi di Personal Concierge. Organizziamo, proponiamo e vendiamo eventi e pacchetti di Corporate Hospitality per le aziende e per i loro clienti operando attraverso due linee di business:  la qualità dei servizi e l’esclusività degli eventi.  Il nostro portfolio è sempre in continua evoluzione, ampliamento e miglioramento. Solo così possiamo essere certi di star offrendo il meglio di sport, musica, arte e cultura, spettacolo, sia italiano sia internazionale. Dalle visite private a porte chiuse nei più famosi musei italiani (Cappella Sistina a Roma, San Marco a Venezia, Il Cenacolo e Santa Maria delle Grazie a Milano, Il Palazzo dei Normanni a Palermo, etc) ai più importanti eventi sportivi, musicali e culturali italiani. Grazie al nostro accordo con Il Gruppo svizzero Infront e con l’A.C. Milan, Exist si occuperà a 360° della organizzazione e della commercializzazione di tutti i pacchetti di Corporate Hospitality del Milan e della commercializzazione di una serie di eventi e di prodotti collegati sempre al mondo dello sport: Lazio, Genoa, Palermo, Coppa del Mondo di Sci, Basket, Superbike, etc. Siamo inoltre diventati subagenti esclusivi di Infront Sport Italy per la commercializzazione di UEFA EURO 2012 Club Prestige, l’esclusivo programma di Corporate Hospitality del Campionato Europeo di Calcio UEFA, che si terrà in Polonia e Ucraina nel 2012.

Company description: Founded in January of 2017 and headquartered in Rotterdam, The Netherlands, Travis is a manufacturer of translation devices for people to effectively communicate face-to-face with other nationalities. Whether it's for a Japanese hotel concierge welcoming Argentinian guests, a Dutch nurse treating a Polish patient, or an American aid worker providing support to an Indian refugee, Travis creates a human connection, which leads to vital help, a better customer experience and understanding. By integrating the best translation engines and conversation-enhancing functionalities, Travis is the best way for people to be global communicators.   It takes one to know the problem in order to solve the problem. Our small and growing team consists of 11 nationalities, of which most live outside their home country and who face language barriers on a daily basis. Headquartered in Rotterdam, we have satellite offices in Porto (Portugal), Shenzhen (China) and Trivandrum (India).
